name: Manon Les Suites Guldsmeden
address: Gyldenlovesgade 19, 1600 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Featuring an organic breakfast buffet, this hotel is situated 1 km from Copenhagen Central Station. Each spacious suite has a flat-screen TV. The hotel features a rooftop restaurant. WiFi is free. All apartments at Manon Les Suites feature a four-poster bed as well as a kitchenette with a fridge and coffee/tea facilities. Organic toiletries are available in the private bathroom. A fitness room and indoor pool are free to access for all guests. Manon Les Suites is a 7-minute walk from Vesterport Train Station, while the local bus stops just 140 metres away. The main shopping street, Strøget, and Tivoli Gardens are both within a 10-minute walk of the hotel.

name: Hotel Mim Ibiza & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Carles Roman Ferrer, 8, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This stylish, Art-Deco hotel is next to the beach and close to central Ibiza. It offers a fantastic outdoor pool, a nightclub and a roof terrace featuring stunning sea views. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Es Vive have been carefully decorated. They come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom. The restaurant has 1930 design and serves a range of international cuisine including New York-style brunch dishes and deli sandwiches. The Experience bar features chic furnishings and vibrant décor. Hotel Es Vive has a spa offering a wide variety of massages and beauty treatments. Hotel Es Vive is close to Ibiza’s most famous nightclubs such as Pacha or Space. The restaurants in Playa d’en Bossa beach can also be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

name: Fiesta Hotel Cala Gració - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Cala Gracio, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Barceló Portinatx - Adults Only
address: Venda de Portinatx, 62, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: The Barcelo Portinatx offers an exclusive and welcoming adults-only environment in one of the quietest areas of Ibiza. A fairytale setting perfect for a stay relaxed on the seafront and the opportunity for lovers of sports to enjoy all kinds of water sports hiking or cycling.The hotel is just 20 metres from Portinatx beach close to the enchanting Ibizan town of San Juan and 40 minutes drive from Ibiza Port; this hotel offers travellers a small sanctuary for a restful holiday. Its fully refurbished rooms half of which are Junior Suites have sea views and some have a hot tub on the terrace. The hotel has a large sun terrace 2 swimming pools an outdoor Wellness space a terrace with panoramic views of the sea and a Beach Club. There is also free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.Barcelo.com

name: Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Sa Cala Den Xuclar, 50, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a free spa with sauna and hot tub, Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only is located in Portinatx, just off the beach.There is free WiFi throughout. Bright spacious rooms are air-conditioned and feature hardwood floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a desk, a dressing room and a safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Set in a quiet area, the seafront Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only offers a buffet restaurant and a bar. There is also a TV lounge and evening entertainment programme. There is a 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or exchange currency at the tour desk. Ibiza Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only
address: C/ Po. Box 40, Playa Cala Llonga, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only is just 100 metres from Cala Llonga Beach. It has a swimming pool and the air-conditioned rooms have private terraces and a hydromassage shower. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only has a stylish chill-out area with a hot tub and Balinese sunbeds, providing wonderful Mediterranean views. There is free WiFi in public areas, and an air-conditioned satellite TV lounge. The hotel offer Show cooking restaurant and Buffet. There are also 2 bars, one of them offering live entertainment. All of the hotel´s rooms have comfortable furniture, flat-screen satellite TV and iPod docking station. They also have a minibar and a laptop-sized safe. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only also has a large sun terrace with loungers and a tennis court.

name: Sandos El Greco Beach- Adults Only
address: Cala Portinatx, Portinatx, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza, 7810, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Set in the northern end of Ibiza, Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only is located on the beachfront of Portinax offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and access to the white sand beach. The hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre. There is also a wellness centre with beauty treatments and massages available at a cost. Guests will also find a chill-out area with a whirlpool. There are 250 rooms spread throughout five floors. All air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, a Led TV, telephone and a balcony. Each, has a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. There is a la carte restaurant, where guests can enjoy an included dinner for stays of 5 nights, a snack bar by the pool and an air-conditioned buffet restaurant with show cooking and a pizzeria. Sandos El Greco Beach also has 3 bars. Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only has a 24-reception, an entertainment program and snorkeling and cycling can be arranged. Ibiza Airport is 29 km from the hotel.

name: Grupotel Santa Eulària & Spa - Adults Only
address: C/ Pare Vicent Costa, 16, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set metres from the sea and overlooking Santa Eulária Bay, Grupotel Santa Eulária & Spa features a large lagoon-style swimming pool and free spa. The rooms have spacious balconies. All accommodation at the Grupotel Santa Eulária & Spa is brightly decorated and spacious. Each air-conditioned room features satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel is set 800 metres from Santa Eulária’s main beach and the resort centre can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot. Ibiza Town is around 12 km away. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, sauna, ice fountain and Turkish baths. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel entertainment includes shows, live music and dancing. Hot and cold buffets and show cooking are available in the restaurant, and there is also a snack bar service on the terrace.

name: Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Playa den Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Set on Playa d’en Bossa Beach, the adults-only Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel features a spa and 3 outdoor pools with large sun beds. Guests enjoy free entrance to live DJ performances hosted by the hotel. The minimalist rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a 42-inch plasma TV and iPod docking station. They also feature a furnished terrace. The Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel is made up of 2 separate buildings. The Ushuaia Club houses the bedrooms and hosts the hotel's famous parties. The exclusive Ushuaia Tower offers 24-hour room service, an outdoor pool, Balinese beds and a poolside cocktail bar. The hotel offers the Minami Japanese fusion restaurant with a Zen garden, as well as a Beach Club restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine. The property's Montauk Steak House restaurant specialises in steaks and other grilled meats. The hotel is 2 km from Ibiza Airport and 3 km from Ibiza Old Town. It is located directly opposite Hi Ibiza. Check the hotel's app for available services.

name: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only
address: Playa Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only is a 4-star hotel featuring a wellness centre, a fitness area, swimming pool and Balinese beds located in Santa Eularia des Riu. Las Dalias Hippy Market is 3.5 km away. Each modern room here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and satellite channels. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A free safe is also available. There is an a la carte restaurant and a buffet-style restaurant, two bars and a show cooking. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff and a tour desk. The hotel is 3.3 km from Ibiza Conference Centre and 1.2 km from Nikki Beach Ibiza. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 23 km away.

name: Axelbeach Ibiza Spa & Beach Club - Adults Only
address: Calle Cala de Bou 46., 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beachfront at San Antonio Beach, AxelBeach Ibiza is an adults only hotel featuring 2 outdoor pools, a free spa and a gym with sea views. The modern, air-conditioned suites and apartments come with a sofa bed and a kitchen with a fridge, microwave and a Bosch coffee machine. All have a balcony or terrace with sea views, as well as free WiFi. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The spa includes a hot tub, hammam and sauna. A massage service is also available for an extra charge. There is a restaurant and café with a chill out terrace and a poolside bar. The complex also has direct beach access and a beach club with a restaurant and bar service, and sun beds for rent. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. There is 24-hour reception and a laundry service is available. Ibiza Airport is 23 minutes' drive away and Ses Salines Beach is 27 km from AxelBeach Ibiza - Adults Only. There is parking onsite at a cost.

name: Trs Ibiza Hotel
address: Carretera Cala Gracio (Cami Del Portixol 1) Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: TRS Ibiza Hotel -All Inclusive Adults Only Hotel, a luxury hotel with direct access to the beach, is located in the San Antonio area next to Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta, two beautiful coves with crystal clear waters surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation. This environment of great beauty is perfect for you to enjoy exclusive vacations as a couple or with friends that include premium services, an exquisite gastronomic offer of its 3 a la carte restaurants, 24-hour butler service and the Infinite Indulgence experience, the All Inclusive that goes further beyond excellence. The Signature Level rooms includes services, amenities, exclusive drinks, minibar. Access to the Gravity Sky Lounge with Infinity pool, access to exclusive sun lounger area by the Io pool. Access to the Zentropia Spa to enjoy water circuit. Selected events at Ushuaia, Hard Rock and Hi club. Dine out, that include exclusive menus in a selection of Ibiza´s restaurants. TRS Ibiza offers you rooms and suites with hydromassage bathtubs, treatments and massages from Zentropia Palladium Spa & Wellness, three restaurants and four bars, three swimming pools and a complete menu of activities like yoga, Pilates and live music.

name: THB Los Molinos Adults Only
address: C/ Ramon Muntaner, 60, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: THB Los Molinos is located on the beachfront in Ibiza. It has a sauna, fitness centre and hot tub, and offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, satellite TV and minibar. THB Los Molinos is an adults-only hotel including an à la carte restaurant, bar, garden area and a terrace. A 24-hour reception is also available. There are Balinese beds and a bar next to the pool and a spa with free access. All of the rooms and public areas at THB Los Molinos are covered by free WiFi access. There is also a business centre with wired internet. The property also offers banquet facilities. THB Los Molinos is a 5-minute walk from Ibiza Old Town, known as Dalt Vila. Ibiza Cathedral is only 900 metres away, while the Pacha Nightclub is 1.9 km away.

name: Destino Pacha Ibiza - Entrance to Pacha Club Included
address: Cap Martinet s/n, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set around an outdoor pool, and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Destino Pacha Ibiza is set on the hillside in Cap Martinet. Talamanca Beach is a 5-minute walk away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a stylish, white décor and large windows. Each one includes free Wi-Fi, a TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Destino Pacha Ibiza's restaurant offers fusion cuisine, with Japanese, Mediterranean and Central American influences. It uses fresh, local products. The pool is surrounded by palm trees and hammocks, and poolside massages are available. There is also a large hot tub and hot yoga classes. Pacha Ibiza Club is a 20-minute walk from the resort, while Ibiza city centre is around 3.5 km away. Ibiza Port can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and boats to Formentera, Mallorca and Valencia leave from here.

name: Play Hotel Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Calle Al Sabini 18, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Fully Renovated on 2022, the New Play Hotel Ibiza - Opening 2022 is set 100 meters away from Figueretas Beach and a 15 min walk from the lively center of Ibiza Town. This Hotel has a solarium sea view terrace. Play Hotel Ibiza - Opening 2022 offers free Wi-Fi in public areas. Rooms come with a tiled floor, air conditioning, and private bathroom with toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony and sea views. The hotel has a bar with terrace where you can enjoy drinks and snacks during the day. Reception offers any information or assistance that may be needed. Ibiza Town Bus Station is a 10-minute walk from Play Hotel Ibiza - Opening 2022, with bus connections to Es Cavallet and Ses Salines beaches.

name: THB El Cid
address: Calle Vaixell 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This recently refurbished holiday resort has a fantastic seafront location in a beautiful Mediterranean setting, conveniently positioned just a short drive from the airport. It has free Wi-Fi. THB El Cid - Adults Only, with its peaceful, seaside location, offers well-appointed accommodation, sea views and great facilities and offers a great base while you enjoy all Majorca has to offer. You will never be short of things to do at this complex that features 3 swimming pools (one heated), gardens, a tennis court, a bicycle garage and table-tennis. Guests will also find a sauna, steam bath and a gym. Seasonal hotel: open from February to October.

name: Hotel Negresco - Adults Only
address: Neopatria, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated on the seafront in Playa de Palma, Negresco has an outdoor pool. All of the air-conditioned rooms offer full or side sea views. The airport is just 5 km away. The rooms have satellite TV, private balconies and double-glazing. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Negresco has a bar and a restaurant serving buffet breakfast and dinner. There is a large terrace by the pool where you can enjoy a drink. The terrace also has free loungers. On-site parking and spa are available at an extra cost. The Negresco can also arrange car hire.

name: Hm Balanguera Beach- Adults Only
address: Calle Marbella, 35, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Balanguera Beach is situated metres from popular Palma Beach and within 5 km of Aeropuerto de Palma. The hotel is a convenient base from which to enjoy Majorca's great climate. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All the rooms are en suite and many have their own balcony. Although the beach is just steps away, the complex also has a swimming pool with a bar service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served as a buffet, and the dining room is non-smoking. Palma Beach offers an enjoyable base for a holiday given the range of activities on offers from water sports to a walk along the seafront promenade. Palma city is approximately 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Myseahouse Flamingo
address: Misión San Diego, 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, Hotel Flamingo - Adults Only 4* Sup boasts two outdoor swimming pool with sea views and has free WiFi throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each charming room at this hotel comes with a balcony or a terrace. All of them include satellite TV, a telephone and a free safety deposit box. Most rooms have lateral or frontal views of the Mediterranean sea. Hotel Flamingo offers a spa with a pool, hydromassage baths, thermal circuit, steam bath a sauna and "sensation" showers. It has a relaxation area with loungers and direct access to the garden. The accommodation offers a gym and a bicycle room for washing and storing the bicycles. Guests have easy access to different activities in the area nearby the hotel. Palma's Old Town is 10 minutes' drive from the property. Bars, restaurants and shops are within walking distance from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 3 km away.

name: Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma - Adults Only
address: Avenida America 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only is set in Playa de Palma. The hotel has a spa centre and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hair dryer. Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only features free WiFi throughout the property. The property has 3 on-site restaurants; an Asian-fusion restaurant, Bistro restaurant, and a Buffet restaurant. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bike storage is available for a cost. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.8 km from Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only, while Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Please note that dress code allowed in buffet is shorts. (No swimsuit, no tank tops, no flip-flops) and A la carte restaurants: long pants.

name: Be Live Adults Only La Cala Boutique
address: Gavina, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Be Live Adults Only La Cala is set on the beachfront of Cala Major, just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma. This adults-only hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. Rooms at La Cala Boutique Hotel come with an iPod speaker, a Nespresso coffee machine and a safety deposit box. The bright and modern rooms have free WiFi, a minibar with welcome items and a pool towel. The bathroom has a scale, bathrobe and slippers. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and dinner is available at the buffet restaurants. There is also an outdoor bar. Seasonal Masai Restaurant offers lovely views of the sea and boasts its signature cuisine (additional charge). Other services offered include car rental, a tour desk and a laundry service. Guests may use the relaxation area and gym at the hotel next door, for an extra cost. The property also includes the Pelicano Beach Club, open from May to October. A bus stop is located just a few steps from the hotel and buses will take you to the city centre. Palma Airport is 20 km away. When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included. When booking 9 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply. For payments over €1000 it is mandatory to make it by credit card

name: Iberostar Bahia de Palma - Adults Only
address: Carrer Marbella, 32, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located only 20 metres from a long sandy beach, Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only features a rooftop terrace with an infinity pool and sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only is a hotel for adults only and is equipped to help you relax. Enjoy the excellent facilities offered by the hotel, including the Sensations Spa, the swimming pool and wellness area. This is also an ideal place to participate in sporting activities, such as cycling. "The Origin Beach Soul" À la carte restaurant is not included in any accommodation meal plan. The hotel is 11 km from Palma, the capital of the island of Majorca. The airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Grupotel Acapulco Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Costa Brava, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca's Playa de Palma Beach, Grupotel Acapulco Playa - Adults Only is 6 km from Palma Airport. It offers a heated indoor pool, and an outdoor pool with a hot tub, sun loungers and great views. Property is located infront of the beach, first row. Air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and a private balcony, most with sea views. There is a minbar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Acapulco Playa - Adults Only offers a breakfast buffet. Drinks and light snacks are available on the outdoor terrace, which offers good views over the seafront promenade. There is live music in the evenings.

name: Pure Salt Garonda - Adults Only
address: Carrer de la Mar Negra 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star, adults-only Pure Salt Garonda lies on the seafront at Playa de Palma, 6.5 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Offering sea or garden views, all rooms are large, heated and air-conditioned. They come with a satellite TV, balcony and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. There is a spa with an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Pure Salt Garonda-Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes, it offers a fitness area as well as storage facilities for golf accessories and bicycles. Pure Salt Garonda has 2 restaurants. One is open for breakfast and dinner. The other is located in front of the beach and serves lunch and dinner. The hotel offers a concierge service and computers with internet access are available at reception, subject to an additional charge. The hotel also offers car rental, excursions and currency exchange. A laundry and towel service is available. There is a bus stop only 20 metres from Pure Salt Garonda. Buses to Palma de Mallorca, 9 km away, leave every 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer De Sant Bartolomeu, 24, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only is just 400 metres from the marina and beach, in Majorca's El Arenal. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. The hotel is just a few metres from the nearest bus stop and Palma Airport is just 6km away. Free public parking is available nearby. The hotel's spa features a Turkish bath, hot tub and foot baths. There is also a range of massages available. Rooms at the Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only are spacious and bright. They all have a balcony, air conditioning and free WiFi. The hotel also has elegant lounge areas, as well as a buffet restaurant and a bar. An evening entertainment programme is also offered. Pets are allowed as long as they weigh less than 8 kg. Pet access to the common areas of the bar, pool, dining room and spa is restricted for reasons of hygiene and well-being of our clients. For more information, ask at reception.

name: Hotel Araxa - Adults Only
address: Pilar Juncosa, 22, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Araxa - Adults only is a 10-minute walk from the seafront and Bellver Castle. Set among green gardens, it features outdoor pool, free gym and spa available spa charges may apply. Large rooms at Hotel Araxa - Adults only are equipped with air conditioning, a TV and free wired internet access. Facilities include safe and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and shower amenities. Continental breakfasts and a combination of regional specialities from the Balearic Islands with international dishes are served at the on-site restaurant. During the summer months guests can enjoy outdoor dining. The spa includes hot tub, Turkish bath, infrared and steam saunas and massage treatments. Staff at the 24-hour reception of the Hotel Araxa - Adults only can help plan visits and excursions. A small free private parking is available. This property does not accommodate stag, hen parties or similar parties.

name: Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca - Adults Only
address: Antas de Ulla,14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 450 metres from El Arenal sandy beach, Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca is an adults-only hotel offering free entrance to live DJ performances and rock concerts hosted by the hotel. A music inspired décor is blended with the latest audiovisual technology to offer guests a rich sensorial experience. Daily musical events take place at the hotel including live-music shows, DJ sessions and video projections. A professional recording studio, meeting rooms and an event centre are available at an extra cost. Indico Rock boasts two swimming pools and two terraces with sun loungers and balinese beds. Guests can have drinks at the pool bar or the Sky bar. Other facilities include a rooftop terrace, a disco. Breakfast and dinner, both, are served buffet style, featuring show cooking. There is a vegan and vegetarian corner. For lunch, guests can order a lá carte Mediterranean dishes. Modern rooms come with air conditioning, a TV with international, radio channels and video on demand, a furnished balcony and a bathroom with a hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box are available upon request and carry a surcharge. The hotel offers free WiFi throughout.

name: Hotel Don Pepe - Adults Only
address: San Cristóbal nº 43, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Don Pepe is located 5 minutes’ walk from S’Arenal Beach and Marina, in Majorca’s Palma Bay. This design hotel offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi in common areas and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. The hotel's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a lounge bar which serves snacks throughout the day and has a big screen. Don Pepe Hotel has a games room with board games, and a massage service is available on request. The hotel also offers a tour desk as well as car and bicycle rental services. The Don Pepe Hotel is just 6 km from Majorca Airport. You can drive to Palma city centre in around 15 minutes.

name: Mll Mediterranean Bay Hotel - Adults Only
address: C/ Sant Bartomeu, 18, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Mediterranean Bay is 350 metres from S’Arenal Beach and has an outdoor pool, an outdoor hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room offers free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Mediterranean Bay has a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. Breakfast in your room is available on request. The hotel’s rooms have elegant, modern design. They all include a private bathroom. The Mediterranean Bay has a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Free public parking is available nearby. The Mediterranean Bay Hotel is set in Majorca’s Palma Bay, 11 km from Palma city centre. The area has many shops and bars.

name: Houm Nets
address: Calle Villagarcía de Arosa, 20, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This small, modern hotel is located 200 metres from the beach in Palma de Mallorca. It has an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace. Facilities at Houm Nets include a snack-bar, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Each room at Houm Nets comes with a balcony and air conditioning. They all have an en suite bathroom. Breakfast and dinner are available at the Aparthotel Plaza Son Rigo, next door to the Houm Nets.

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas, 7, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Aluasoul Palma Hotel Adults Only
address: Maestro Ekitai Ahn, 40, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The adults-only Alua Soul Palma in Can Pastilla is situated on Cala Estancia Beach in Mallorca’s Palma Bay. Each air-conditioned room includes a balcony, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Alua Soul Palma features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. There are wonderful views of Palma Bay and the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel’s restaurant opens for breakfast and dinner, serving a buffet of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar and a café-bar. Alua Soul Palma Can Pastilla is located less than 2 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport and around 8 km from Palma city centre. Free parking can be found near the hotel, and public buses stop nearby. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: • Selection of the best rooms. • Personalised check-in and check-out. • Exclusive My Favorite Club Lounge serving and drinks during the day. • Access to “Vértigo Sky Bar” our Rooftop with amazing sea views, exclusively for My Favorite Club guests

name: THB Maria Isabel
address: Carrer Villagarcia Arosa, 19, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a wellness centre with an indoor pool and sauna, THB Maria Isabel is located 400 metres from Palma Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. All rooms at THB Maria Isabel are air-conditioned, bright and spacious. Each comes with a balcony, some of them offering pool or sea views. All rooms have a shower. The hotel offers a bicycle garage which is free for guests. There is also a large sun terrace with sunbeds around the swimming pool. A restaurant, as well as bycicle rent and garage. Palma City Centre is 15 minutes by car and offers a cathedral, port and a selection of restaurants. Palma Airport is 4 km away.

name: Js Palma Stay Adults Only
address: C/ Pins, 26, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Js Palma Stay Adults Only is just 80 metres from Mallorca’s C’an Pastilla Beach. The complex features 1 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a sun terrace, gym, and a spa with a sauna. All air-conditioned rooms at the Js Palma Stay feature a private balcony or terrace. There is a private bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are included. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a variety of Spanish and European dishes. There is a bar and entertainment is provided, with evening shows several times a week. A laundry service is available.There is a 24-hour front desk. There are many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Palma de Mallorca is 8 km away.

name: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only
address: Carrer Castell 3, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only is set directly in front of Cala Millor Beach, in eastern Majorca. The complex has outdoor and indoor swimming pools and a lovely garden. This modern complex offers comfortable rooms. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for beach and nature lovers as it is located next to the Natural Area Punta de n'Amer.

name: Hotel Astoria Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Astoria, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The modern, adults-only Hotel Astoria Playa is located in heart of the popular resort of Alcúdia, just 150 metres from the beach. It has 2 outdoor swimming pools, including one with a chill-out zone, and free Wi-Fi. Set in 4000 m² of gardens, the hotel has spacious sun terraces featuring 3 outdoor hot tubs and a poolside snack bar. The restaurant offers show cooking. The Astoria Playa Hotel also provides a seasonal programme entertainment with Live Dj during the day and live music in the evening several times each week. Hotel Astoria Playa Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle repair shop. There is an array of things to do in the surroundings of the Hotel Astoria Alcudia, such as a range of water sports, cycletourism, aerial sports and a golf course. The promenade is lined with bar, restaurants and shops. Pool towels can be requested with no extra cost.

name: Plaza Santa Ponsa Boutique - Adults Only.
address: Plaza Santa Ponsa, 2, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Set on Plaza Santa Ponsa, Plaza Santa Ponsa Boutique Hotel is just 200 metres from the beach. It features a restaurant, and an outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and sun loungers. Rooms are decorated in a modern-style and open onto a balcony or terrace. All rooms have air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. The restaurant offers a set lunch menu and show cooking. There is an spacious terrace where guests can enjoy a drink or a meal. Cubanito Cocktail Bar has a variety of drinks and features unique décor. Breakfast is served daily. There is a 24-hour reception and free WiFi in the lobby area. The staff can arrange a variety of excursion to those who are interested. A tennis club and 2 golf courses can be found within 6 km of the property. The centre of Santa Ponsa is a 5-minute walk away, while Palma and its airport are within 30 km of the property. Rental car is available at the hotel.

name: Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avinguda Cristofol Colom, 71, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated close to the beautiful Cala Millor Beach, Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only is designed exclusively for adults. It offers several swimming pools, live music and a relaxed atmosphere. The air-conditioned rooms in the modern Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only offer free WiFi, satellite TV and minibar. Safes are available to rent. There are several outdoor swimming pools, an indoor and outdoor hot tub, and a heated indoor swimming pool in winter months. The heated pool and one of the other pools are accessible to guests with reduced mobility. The hotel has a sauna and offers a wide range of massages. There are also multi-sports courts, a tennis court, gym and air rifle range, as well as putting green. During the day there are fitness activities such as dance classes, tai-chi and bike trips. At night, there are live shows. Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only has an air-conditioned restaurant serving dishes such as fish or steak, as well as gourmet desserts. It features show cooking and caters for celiacs. There is also a snack bar with a large terrace and a poolside bar-restaurant. Local attractions include the Punta de n'Amer country estate, the Hams Caves, some of Mallorca's most attractive coves. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Agua Beach
address: Paseo del Mar, 24, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only is situated next to Majorca’s Palma Nova Beach, just 150 metres from Palma Nova centre. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and a shared pool. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only includes satellite TV and a safe. Amenities and a hairdryer are included in the private bathrooms. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the sea. Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" has a buffet restaurant with extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar or outside on the seafront terrace. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. The Agua Beach - Adults Only is just a 5-minute walk from many of Palma Nova’s lively bars and discos. Palma is 14 km away, and there are various golf courses within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Sóller - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Migjorn 2, 07108 Soller, Mallorca
description: Enjoying an unbeatable location overlooking Majorca's Puerto de Soller Bay, Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller, part of the Designhotels, offers a heated outdoor pool, a spa and free bikes. Rooms at this hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some have coffee and tea making facilities and a sofa. All have private bathrooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller is well situated for outdoor activities, including sailing, diving and snorkelling. Yoga classes are also available on site. Palma de Mallorca is 40 minutes' drive away and Palma Airport is 37 km away.

name: Secrets Mallorca Villamil Resort & Spa Only Adults
address: Secrets Mallorca Villamil, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Housed in a stately building with gardens, the charming Secrets Mallorca Villamil is located on Peguera Beach. It features cycling facilities, an outdoor heated swimming pool, a spa with sauna, steam bath, hot tub and sensation showers (all spa services for an extra cost) Rooms offer city views of Paguera, views to the garden or the sea. They include free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and minibar. The World Café offers a buffet with a selection of international cuisine made with fresh, seasonal produce. There is a daily breakfast buffet and in summer guests can have breakfast on the terrace overlooking the sea. The Olio Restaurant is located by the pool and serves local dishes such as rice, fresh fish and other snacks. Open in the evening, Seaside Grill Restaurant offers beautiful sea views and serves Mediterranean cuisine. You can also enjoy a drink and live music in Piano and Sky Bar. The hotel also has a gym and free parking for bikes. Massages are available for an extra cost and Pilates and Stretching classes are also available for free. Once a week in summer, the hotel organizes a free boat trip for hotel guests. The Secrets Mallorca Villamil is the official hotel of the Triathlon Challenge Paguera Mallorca. The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: -access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, -exclusive concierge service, -selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, among other special advantages. Nicely located, Secret Mallorca Villamil is 3 km from Golf de Andratx; and you can drive to both Golf de Santa Ponsa and Bendinat Golf Club within 15 minutes by car.

name: Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only
address: Carrer Lisboa 4, 07180 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Offering views of Santa Ponça Beach, Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only offers 4 seasonal outdoor pools, 2 of them with a swim-up area, a bike station, and a free spa and wellness centre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The hotel is set over 4 different buildings. Each air-conditioned and quiet room comes with modern décor, a free safe, fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and coffee & tea making facilities. Most have a balcony with views of the sea or the pools. The private bathroom comes with with a rainshower, hairdryer, amenities and vanity mirror. The hotel's spa and wellness centre include free access to the gym, sauna, whirlpool, Turkish bath, indoor pool, and massage and treatment cabins. Guests in Premium rooms and suites have exclusive access to the rooftop pools and terraces during the day. The hotel has a pool snack bar and a buffet restaurant for dinner.

name: BQ Maria Dolores
address: Carrer De Palmira, 29, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is just 200 metres from the beach in the heart of Peguera. It offers a quiet atmosphere and a swimming pool. The rooms in the BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only have fully fitted bathroom, satellite TV and safe. They all have air conditioning and heating. The outdoor pool is set in gardens with pine trees. Next to it is a sun terrace with free loungers. Inside there is a TV room and a business centre with internet access. The restaurant at the BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only offers Spanish and international dishes. There is also a bar. Peguera is located in the west of Mallorca. The BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is about 100 metres from Peguera’s main street. There you can find a wide range of restaurants, bars and shops.

name: Hipotels Hipocampo - Adults Only
address: Carrer Bonanza 2, 97560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Enjoy the beachfront location and extensive facilities of this 4-star hotel, located overlooking the bay of Cala Millor. The setting of the Hipotels Hipocampo is ideal for a relaxing break on Majorca’s golden sands. Dive into the clear Mediterranean waters or take a dip in the hotel’s own outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. Relax with a session in the sauna before cooling off in the hot tub. You will also find a heated indoor swimming pool within the hotel. Choose between dining at the hotel’s own buffet restaurant or strolling along the seafront to the nearby resort centre, where you can enjoy the range of restaurants.

name: Js Cape Colom - Adults Only
address: Carrer Assumpcio, 14, Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Offering incredible Mediterranean Sea views Hotel JS Cape Colom has a spectacular cliff-top setting in Porto Colom. It features a large outdoor swimming pool. The hotel has over 1000 m² of terraces and gardens, with direct access to the sea. The buffet restaurant offers local and international foods, as well as show cooking. There is also a snack bar by the pool. The Cape Colom's spa includes a sauna, a hot tub and pressure showers, as well as massages. It also has a gym, a semi olympic swimming pool and sports facilities, including tennis and squash courts. Each of the Cape Colom's air-conditioned rooms has a balcony, with some offering sea views. There is also satellite TV and a private bathroom. Porto Colom is one of Mallorca's best natural harbours, and is 500 metres from the sandy beach at Cala Marsal. Activities including scuba diving, fishing and sailing are on offer here.

name: Parque Nereida Suites Hotel
address: Avenida Cala Lliteras, 4, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: BG Hotel Rei del Mediterrani
address: Creuer,14, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Hotel Rei Del Mediterrani Palace is located on Mallorca and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi and miniature golf. It is also steps from Muro's well-known attractions and landmarks. The hotel offers a range of wellbeing facilities, such as a spa, a fitness centre and a swimming pool. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Hotel Rei Del Mediterrani Palace has air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. Each have an in-room safe, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel is an ideal base to discover nearby Alcudia and Puerto de Alcudia, which are within a 10-minute drive. Son Sant Joan Airport is a 45-minute drive away.Revato

name: Barceló Illetas Albatros - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas 15, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Barcelo Illetas Albatros Adults only is an exclusive hotel; just for adults; where you can enjoy the best holiday that Majorca can offer B-Rooms; decorated in a minimalist style; with services and equipment using the latest technology The hotel has a swimming pool area; Balinese beds; Whirlpool Baths and its own cove with private access Foodies will appreciate the best designer cuisine while enjoying the unique sea views; or they can sip a delicious cocktail on the Urban Sky Terrace open during the summer months What is more; guests can communicate directly with the hotel reception via our 24 hour Whatsapp Concierge ServiceBarcelo.com

name: Son Moll Sentits Hotel & Spa
address: Calle Nereidas, 1, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Son Moll Sentits Hotel & Spa boasts an outdoor and indoor pool, furnished terrace and a spa and wellness centre. Located in Cala Ratjada, Son Moll Beach is just 250 metres away. Each bright bedroom at Son Moll Sentits Spa features a balcony, air conditioning, heating and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms also include a telephone, radio and safety deposit box. The bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms allow you to customize the sound, aroma and lighting. There is a fitness centre and massages are offered for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel's bar. Free WiFi connection is available in the lobby and there is also an exclusive Gourmet Restaurant and a Panorama Bar at the top of the hotel. Capdepera Golf Club is 6 km from the hotel. Other beaches, such as Cala Agulla, are within 7 minutes' drive away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 1 hour away by car.

name: Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida de los Pinos, 61, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Featuring direct access to Ratjada Beach, the adults-only Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers views of this pretty cove. It features a spa with free entry, outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. Take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool surrounded by a large sun terrace with views of the Mediterranean waters. There is a heated indoor swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, massages, gym, tennis club Aguait with 11 clay courts, table tennis and a billiard table. When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: Cap Rocat
address: Ctra. d'Enderrocat, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is a former military fortress, carefully restored to offer 5-star luxury accommodation. The hotel offers wonderful views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Majorcan countryside. Hotel Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is set in a quiet area of Palma Bay, near Cala Blava. The hotel has direct access to the sea. There is also an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. The hotel offers a Spa which guests can use for free, and a Hammam at an extra cost. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre with a personal training service. Outdoor yoga and pilates classes are also offered. Rooms at the hotel offer a private balcony, air conditioning and a minibar. They also come with a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a CD and DVD player. Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World’s restaurant serves fresh Mediterranean food. The hotel also offers large public lounges and patios. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. For safety reasons due to the unique architecture of the fortress, Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World cannot accommodate children younger than 15 years old.

name: La Goleta Hotel de Mar - Adults Only
address: Paseo Saralegui 118, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Featuring an a la carte restaurant and swimming pool, La Goleta Hotel de Mar - Adults Only is located 30 metres from the beach in Port de Pollença. This stylish hotel offers rooms with free WiFi. Each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen TV, minibar, desk, and laptop safe. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Modern cuisine is served at La Goleta Hotel de Mar’s on-site restaurant, while the hotel also has a terrace and bar. There is also a 24.hour reception, as well as a tour desk and ticket service. La Goleta de Mar - Adults only is equipped to welcome cyclists. It offers a bicycle garage and repair shop. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 52 km away.

name: Tacande Portals Wellness & Relax
address: Den Caldentei, 15, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Tacande Portals Wellness & Relax is situated in a residential area in Portals Nous, surrounded by natural beauty, away from the hustle and bustle of the town. The facilities the hotel offers make it the perfect place to relax and have fun. There are two swimming pools and a terrace with gardens where you can relax and soak in the Mediterranean sun. Two unique experiences in one hotel, the Cala Zone and the adults-only Costa Zone.The two areas of the complex near the sea and are less than 300 metres from each other. All rooms come with air conditioning, heating, safe and free WiFi. Some include VIP amenities and access to the executive lounge. The comfortable hotel is just a short walk to the beach, and to the town centre, where there is an attractive marina, dolphin aquarium and nearby a well-kept golf course. There are a number of restaurants around the marina and more along the main street.

name: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only
address: Avinguda De Cala Egos, Cala D'or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is a four-star hotel located in a beautiful cove in south-east Mallorca, facing Cala Egos Beach. It has 3 outdoor pools, one for My Favorite Club guests. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort has extensive solarium areas and chill out. The rooms at the AluaSoul Mallorca have all the facilities: rain shower, air conditioning, equipped balcony, safe, kettle, 42'' TV, free Wi-Fi, hair dryer. The modern rooms at this hotel feature a balcony and satellite TV. The private bathroom include free toiletries. This hotel has 5 restaurants with both à la carte and buffet options and 2 bars, one of which is a beach bar. The Mare Nubium Restaurant offers a selection of international dishes and the bar serves aperitifs and cocktails in the evening. The property offers a varied entertainment programme and has a beach club. The hotel also offers gym, wellness area, 3 swimming pools and solarium. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is just 2.5 km from the centre of Cala d’Or, with its shops, bars and restaurants. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: -Personalized check-in and check-out -Access to the My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and beverages -Reserved areas in indoor and outdoor areas -Selection of the best rooms including superior attributes

name: THB Gran Playa - Adults Only
address: Paseo Colon 126, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Just 100 metres from the beaches of Ca’n Picafort, in northern Mallorca, the adults-only THB Gran Playa offers a pool, hot tub and sauna with sea views. All rooms have air conditioning and balconies. The THB Gran Playa’s spacious and light rooms all have free Wi-Fi and cable TV. The private balconies have a table and chairs, and some have sea views. THB Gran Playa offers a gym. The THB Gran Playa has a beer garden, a bar-café and a buffet restaurant. The breakfast buffet includes Mediterranean and international dishes. The centre of Ca’n Picafort is just a few minutes’ walk away, where you will find a variety of bars and discos. A bus stop just 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel offers a regular service into Palma de Mallorca city. Albufera Natural Park is less than 1 km away.

name: Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only
address: Circuit Del Llac 105, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Ideal for a romantic break, Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has swimming pools surrounded by lovely gardens. This adults-only property offers free WiFi throughout. The Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has an outdoor hot tub, as well as a sauna. There is also a fitness centre, tennis and a multi-sports area. Bicycle rental, massages and treatments are offered at an extra cost. Each room at Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has a balcony or terrace with views over the pool or gardens. The property is only 750 metres from the beaches of Alcudia Bay. The S’Albufera Natural Park is just metres from the hotel. The local area is ideal for hiking, horse-riding and water sports. Free parking is possible on site and a free shuttle to the beach is offered.

name: Aluasoul Alcudia Bay
address: Carrer De La Gavina, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Set on Alcudia Bay, this tranquil hotel is ideal for a break on the long, sandy beaches of northern Majorca, or for simply lying back beside the pool. AluaSoul Alcudia Bay is surrounded by pine trees and lies just 300 metres from several kilometres of fine white sand and clear, Mediterranean waters. Take a dip in the sea or dive into the outdoor swimming pool at the hotel, which comes surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. You can choose to get involved in the organised aerobics, volleyball, tennis or football. After a delicious buffet meal, settle down to enjoy the live entertainment offered each evening.

name: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa - Adults Only
address: Aribau 33, 08011 Barcelona
description: The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too. Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs. The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows. The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel
address: Avinguda Del Tibidabo, 1, Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from the hotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria 24, Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking the sea, the adults-only Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only is an ideal accommodation for spending a relaxing break in the sun on the island of Gran Canaria. Lie back and soak up the sun on one of the loungers or hammocks surrounding the complex’s year-round heated pool. There is also a free spa centre and fitness suite on site where you can enjoy a range of treatments or a relaxing massage for a surcharge. The on-site restaurant and bar, The Club, offers a buffet breakfast and a more formal sit-down meal in the evening. After dining, you can sit back with a drink in the poolside bar or in the rooftop chill out. The rooms in the Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only boast balconies or terraces with views of Puerto Rico and the sea. They all have a kitchenette and free WiFi.

name: Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel
address: Carretera De Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: With swimming pools, tennis courts and an elegant restaurant, the Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only is located in Caleta del Fuste and within a golf resort. This hotel features wooden balconies and is located 800 metres from the beach. Each spacious room at Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only features free WiFi, air conditioning, and a private balcony. All have satellite TV, minibar, safe, coffee and tea facilities, and pillow menu. The large bathroom comes with a separate bath and shower, hairdryer, and bathrobes. The Elba’s impressive building boasts traditional Canarian architecture. It has tall palm trees, tiled floors and a grand chandelier. Guests can relax on the beautiful central courtyard. You can find a café, an a la carte restaurant, and a bar within the property. Vegetarian and low-calories options are available to guests.

name: Atlantic Mirage Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Eucaliptus, 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1.5 KM from Martiánez Beach, Hotel Atlantic Mirage Suites & SPA offers an all year round swimming pool and free WiFi. All air-conditioned (cold/warm air subject to seasonality)rooms feature a balcony with sea view. Guests will find a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer and a flat TV with Satellite Channels. All units include a seating area with a sofa. The buffet restaurant Mirage offers a wide range of international options. Guests can also have a drink at the bar. Jardín Botánico and Puerto de la Cruz city centre are 1 Km from the property. The rearest airport is airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 26 Km from the property.

name: Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotels - Adults Only
address: Calle Helsinki, 8, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: The Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotel, recently refurbished, is 200 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, in southern Gran Canaria. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it features an outdoor pool complex. Set in a modern, pyramid-shaped building, the Dunamar Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. The minibar and safe can be rented, and most rooms have a private balcony. Regional and international cuisine is offered in the hotel restaurant, and there are 2 poolside snack bars. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the lively Yumbo Centre. Maspalomas Dunes are 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 2 km away.

name: Mur Neptuno Gran Canaria - Adults Only
address: Avenida Alfeceres Provisionales, 29, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Neptuno is an adults-only hotel, next to the Yumbo Shopping Centre, and 900 metres away from the beach Playa del Inglés. All air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a furnished balcony. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel spa includes a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. The Neptuno's swimming pool is heated from October until April and live music can be enjoyed in the bar several times a week. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. Maspalomas Golf course is 3 km away. You can hire a car and there is free on-site parking.

name: Bohemia Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This hotel is located about 150 m from the beach. Guests will also find restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network around 150 m from the hotel. It lies 400 m from Yumbo, with its 2 shopping centres and nightspots and is just 500 m from the centre of Playa del Ingles. The hotel is 18 km from Vecindario. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 95 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and golf are offered onsite. A gym and squash are some of the sports and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only
address: Avenida Ttoo Tjaereboerg 3, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only is set next to Maspalomas Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It features a heated outdoor saltwater pool, and each room comes with a furnished porch. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV. Some offer a sofa bed. There is a private bathroom, and a safe is available. Other facilities available at the property include the Abora Restaurant. Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only is 2.5 km from Maspalomas Dunes and the beach. Faro 2 Shopping Centre is 1 km away. You can hire a car and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Vanilla Garden Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avda. Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 5, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Vanilla Garden Hotel is located in Playa de las Americas. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, electric kettle, and a balcony. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower. A safe is available for an extra charge. There are a buffet restaurant and a bar. Guests can enjoy a taste of French cuisine at the a-la-carte restaurant Chez Damien. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. Veronicas Strip is a 3-minute walk from Vanilla Garden Hotel, while Siam Park is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Bull Costa Canaria & Spa - Only Adults
address: Las Retamas, 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located right on the seafront in San Agustín, The Bull Hotel & Spa Costa Canaria - Adults Only features outdoor pools, a rooftop sun terrace, a fully equipped gym and a spa. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Rooms are modern and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some offer views of San Agustín beach and its stunning sunsets. The Bull Hotel & Spa Costa Canaria - Adults Only spa features a floating pool, water massage beds, Finnish sauna and Hammam. There is also a jet pool, salt cabin and tanning beds. Guests can enjoy relaxation and beauty treatments, including massages, for an extra cost. The hotel offers a 24-hour library with internet access, and guests can read national and international daily press free of charge. Costa Canaria’s buffet restaurant and poolside bar serves regional and international dishes. The Salón Bar offers snacks, music and cocktails. The resort of Playa del Inglés is less than 3 km away.

name: Gold by Marina - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Estados Unidos, 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Gold Playa del Ingles - Adults Only is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés. This modern hotel has a spacious pool area with stylish design, 2 pools, a hot tub and lots of loungers. The air-conditioned rooms at this adults-only hotel feature cool, white décor with turquoise details. Each one has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a mini-kitchenette with a hob, microwave and toaster. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace, and some have sea views. The hotel's restaurant serves an extensive daily buffet breakfast until 12:00. You can enjoy lunch by the pool, and the bar serves cocktails. The hotel's large Planetarium chill-out area with suspended orbs hanging from the ceiling and is a great place to relax with a cocktail. The lively Yumbo Shopping Centre is just 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. You can walk to Maspalomas Sand Dunes in around 10 minutes.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Beach - Adults Only, by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: All rooms are very spacious Junior Suites with sea views.A wide gastronomic offerMARESIA GASTRONOMIC SPACE led by the prestigious canarian chef Juan Carlos Padron winner of 1 Michelin star and 2 Soles Repsol.NAO ATLANTIC FOOD EXPERIENCE Atlantic buffet style restaurant breakfast and dinner.SAN HO A la carte restaurant specialized in Nikkei fusion cuisine Japanese Peruvian. STARFISH A la carte restaurant specialized in rice dishes fish and grilled meat. LA GELATERIA Traditional Italian ice cream shop.*1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness centre a unique area in which to enjoy an extensive array of massages and treatments.Barcelo.com

name: Barceló Teguise Beach - Adults only
address: Plaza Janubio s/n, 35508 Costa, Lanzarote - Costa Teguise, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: This completely refurbished 4 adults only hotel provides stylish elegance and breathtaking sea views in Lanzarote.Barcelo Teguise Beach is a lifestyle oasis with all the modern facilities you need for a relaxing beachside holiday. Most of the romos feature a private hot tub.Combining fabulous facilities with excellent cuisine at the two on-site restaurants we guarantee you will enjoy an unforgettable adult break with your friends or partner.Barcelo.com

name: HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Italia, 21, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Located 100 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés offers an outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop sun terrace. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each air-conditioned room features a private balcony. It includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar, safe, and a kettle. The complex includes a large restaurant, offering regional dishes. HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés also offers a poolside snack bar and live entertainment. Maspalomas Dunes, and the lively centre of Playa del Inglés, are within a 20-minute walk of HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés. The Yumbo Centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Apartamentos Estrella del Norte
address: Carretera Del Amparo, 75, 38430 Icod de los Vinos, Tenerife
description: Located in Icod de los Vinos, one of the most beautiful and picturesque regions of northwest Tenerife, Estrella del Norte is a very good option to spend a relaxing and satisfactory stay. Estrella del Norte is a nice spanish style building, with an interior courtyard providing plenty of natural light. The complex has 5 floors and a total of 28 units in different types. On the upper floors, reachable by elevator, you can enjoy the confort of our Superior apartments with private sea view terrace. These apartments have a fully equipped open kitchen, a complete bathroom with shower or bath, hairdrier, towels and welcome amenities, and a large living room with satellite tv and a comfortable sofa. There are also apartaments with 2 bedrooms, ideal for families. At Estrella del Norte you can enjoy the panoramic views from its large community terrace, equipped with sun loungers, a balinese bed, and a nice hot tub to relax and unwind while enjoying the views. Specially for families with Little children, we have a large and nicely decorated children´s playground, with slides, ball pool, jumping bed and different toys and costumes for the little ones to have fun. Gastronomy is also very important, so you can taste the delicios specialities at our home restaurant, Los faroles, specialised in typical canarian cuisine, grilled meats and everything served with our own produced ecological fruits and vegetables.VRBO

name: Radisson Blu Resort Lanzarote
address: Avda. Del Mar, 26, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only is located next to Bastian Beach in Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise Resort. It offers 4 outdoor pools. The air-conditioned junior suites and suites at Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only feature modern décor, satelite TV and a mini bar. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and most come with a private balcony. The hotel’s Tremor Buffet Restaurant serves a range of international food. Sesto Senso restraunt is an al a cart italian restaurant and the Dono features a dancefloor and nightly entertainment. There is also a poolside snack bar and a beach bar with a stunning view to the Bastian beach. Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only has a beauty and wellness centre offering a range of treatments. Cucharas Beach is around 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Central Arrecife and Lanzarote Airport are 15 minutes’ drive away. Please note that the hotel Radisson Blu resort Lanzarote will change to ADULTS ONLY +16 hotel from 01.05.2023

name: Iberostar Selection Sábila - Adults Only
address: Ernesto Sarti, 5, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only is located on Fañabe Beach on Tenerife’s Costa Adeje. It has large gardens. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All rooms at Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only come with a balcony, as well as a private bathroom with hairdryer. There is also satellite TV in each room. Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant as well as a selection of bars. These include the lobby bar with terrace and a poolside bar serving snacks and drinks. Guest will find a gourmet market on-site offering a unique gastronomic experience enlivened with music. The hotel offers a gym and the Spa Sensations offers a spa circuit and health and beauty treatments. The hotel is just 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto Colón, an area full of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Tenerife South Airport is a 20-minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 38, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: The elegant Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only is next to Tenerife’s Los Cristianos beach, with amazing views of the bay. It has large outdoor pools, a sauna and a gym. The hotel's spacious rooms have a private balcony, minibar and safe. Rooms offer satellite TV and air-conditioning. They also have a full bathroom, including bathrobes and a hairdryer. The adults only hotel’s restaurant serves buffet lunch. There is a snack bar and a lounge-bar with live music and shows every night. WiFi access is free in public areas of the hotel. The Arona's 24-hour front desk offers currency exchange and car rental. Free public parking is available nearby. The Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only is set on the seafront promenade, a short walk from Los Cristianos Harbour. From here, there are regular ferry services to the islands of La Palma and La Gomera.

name: H10 Playa Esmeralda - Adults Only
address: Punta del Roquito, 2, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Offering impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean, H10 Playa Esmeralda is set directly on Costa Calma Beach. This hotel features a spa and bright, air-conditioned accommodation with balconies. Each of the Esmeralda’s rooms has simple décor and tiled flooring. All rooms have satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer in the Jandia buffet restaurant, set in a striking dining room with a terrace overlooking the ocean. Snacks are served in the Maxorata poolside bar and free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby bar. The H10’s spa has a large indoor pool, hot tub, Turkish baths and a sauna. Treatments include massage and facials. The H10 Esmeralda Playa is a 5-minute walk from the centre of Costa Calma and Fuerteventura Airport is 50 km away.

name: Hotel Boutique La Marquesina - Adults Only
address: Calle Iglesia 2, Corralejo, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: Situated within 2 minutes' walk from Corralejo Beach, Hotel Boutique La Marquesina - Adults Only features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace. Popular points of interest nearby include Corralejo Viejo and Las Clavellinas. Free WiFi is offered. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Hotel Boutique La Marquesina - Adults Only provides rooms with sea view, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation, each room comes with air conditioning and a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Hotel Boutique La Marquesina - Adults Only. The reception at the hotel can provide tips on the area. Charco De Bristol is 1.9 km from Hotel Boutique La Marquesina - Adul, while Las Agujas is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 41 km from the property.

name: Birdcage Gay Resort - Adult Only
address: Egipto, 10, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Aimed at gay men, the 4-star Birdcage G ay Resort men only Lifestyle Hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from the Yumbo Centre in Playa del Inglés. Set in tropical gardens, it features a nudist-friendly outdoor pool, hot tub, hammock and spa area. You choose between deluxe rooms and suites, some with a private garden and sun loungers. All have a fan, flat-screen satellite TV and DVD player, as well as a fridge and minibar. Bathrooms come with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Suites have a separate bedroom and living room with a sofa. Rooms are studio style and feature air conditioning. A varied breakfast can be enjoyed daily on the terrace. There is a stylish lounge with a fireplace, where you can relax with a book from the library or a cocktail, tea or coffee. The spa offers massages, manicures, pedicures, hair styling and more in the garden massage temples or in your room. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Playa del Inglés Beach is a 10-minute walk away and the famous Maspalomas Dunes is 2 km from the complex.

name: H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 28, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as miniature golf. It is also within walking distance of Los Cristianos's popular tourist spots. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at the hotel, including sauna, kids pool and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel offers air conditioned rooms with an iPod docking station, a mini bar and luxury toiletries. They all include a flat-screen TV, a private balcony and bottled water. A satisfying breakfast is prepared every morning at H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel, and there are numerous cafés and eateries close by. Los Cristianos's attractions, including Los Cristianos Harbour, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. Guests are able to visit Playa de las Americas and Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Don Gregory by Dunas, Adults Only
address: Calle de Las Dalias, 11, San Agustin, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Don Gregory by Dunas - Adults Only is next to Gran Canaria’s Las Burras Beach, in the San Agustín area of Playa del Inglés. It has an outdoor swimming pool and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms at the Don Gregory have a private balcony/terrace with Atlantic Ocean views. Rooms feature satellite TV, and a minibar and safe are available to hire. Don Gregory by Dunas - Adults Only has gardens and sun terraces. There is a poolside snack bar and the on-site restaurant serves buffet meals, with regular themed dinners. The hotel is located 3 km from the centre of Playa del Inglés, in an area full of shops and bars. San Agustín Shopping Centre is opposite the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 4 km away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Zentral Center
address: Avenida Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Zentral Center is next to Tenerife’s Las Americas Golf Club, 400 metres from Playa de las Americas Beach. It has an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms at the Zentral Center are modern and air-conditioned. They all include a TV, safe and minibar. Rooms also have a private bathroom. The Zentral Center Hotel has an elegant restaurant and a bar. There are also spacious lounge areas. The 24-hour reception offers currency exchange, and car and bicycle rental. Hotel Zentral Center is set in a quiet area of Las Americas, in southern Tenerife. Tenerife Sur Airport is around 15 km away.

name: Hotel Spa Villalba
address: Calle San Roque, 38613 Vilaflor, Tenerife
description: Hotel Spa Villalba has a peaceful setting, high in the mountains of Tenerife. It offers a spa, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and free WiFi in public areas. The hotel is 15km from the Teide National Park. This UNESCO World Heritage Site contains El Teide, Spain’s highest mountain. The hotel is set in the village of Vilaflor.
