There are many natural parks nearby. These include the Natural Monument of Montaña Colorada. Rooms at the Spa Villalba are comfortable and bright. They have air conditioning, a minibar and satellite TV. There are also bathrobes to use in the spa. The spa and fitness centre includes a Turkish bath, sauna, sanarium, pebble path, a pool and hot tub. Massage treatments are available. The hotel also has a relaxing sun terrace and garden.

name: H10 Sentido White Suites
address: Calle Janubio 1, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Boutique Hotel H10 White Suites - Adults Only is built in a traditional, whitewashed Canarian style, and is set in Lanzarote’s Playa Blanca. It is in a small fishing village in the south of the island. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The air-conditioned suites feature a private balcony or terrace. Each one will come with an iPod docking station and an LCD TV with international channels. There is also a minibar, 1 free bottle of water on arrival, and a Nespresso coffee maker with 4 free capsules per day. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. The property offers 2 outdoor pools, a fitness and beauty centre and stylish accommodation with views of the pool or garden. The property’s beauty centre offers a range of personalised massages and treatments. There is also a sauna, a hot tub and a sun terrace. The property also offers a daily programme of Pilates, Tai Chi and other activities. Boutique Hotel H10 White Suites - Adults Only’s Galeón Restaurant serves buffet meals with show cooking, which you can enjoy on the terrace. There are also 3 bars, including a poolside bar with Balinese beds and another which offers lunch and an extensive entertainment programme. Diabetic and celiac menus will be available on request. Private parking is available for an extra cost, and 24-hour medical assistance is available on site. There is a supermarket next to the property, and Arrecife and its airport are around 30 km away.

name: Iberostar Grand Salomé - Adults Only
address: Calle Londres 15, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: These luxury suites on the Costa Adeje all have a balcony and a hot tub. Grand Hotel Salomé has a Spa Sensations, wellness centre and a modern gym. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. This boutique hotel has a large outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by a sun terrace and a pool bar. There is also a tennis court. The Grand Hotel Salomé has a huge outdoor relaxation area, with armchairs and sea views. The hotel restaurant also has a terrace with sea views. The hotel is set between Duque and Fañabé Beach in Tenerife. The area is ideal for diving, golf and windsurfing. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a bathrobe. 50 meters from the beach. Costa Adeje all have a balcony OR TERRACE and a hot tub. This boutique hotel features a large outdoor pool AND INFINITY POOL.

name: Barceló Santiago - Adults Only
address: Calle La Hondura, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: The hotel is situated in the area of South Tenerife that has the most beautiful landscapes with unique views of the island of La Gomera and the cliffs of Los Gigantes. Recently renovated this unique and attractive hotel has a wide variety of facilities for your complete relaxation. Enjoy large and comfortable rooms with sea views its 3 swimming pools one of them heated its spa and direct access to the beach from the hotel only 200 m away. In addition lovers of good food will enjoy the hotels fabulous cuisine ranging from the most traditional to the most international of cooking.Barcelo.com

name: Adrián Hoteles Colón Guanahaní Adultos Only
address: Avenida de Bruselas,9, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated in the exclusive area of Costa Adeje, on the island of Tenerife, this small and attractive colonial-style property is just a short walk from Playa Fanabe beach. Adrián Hoteles Colón Guanahaní offers various heated pools surrounded by beautifully tranquil gardens. There are also sun loungers surrounding the pool, providing you with the perfect place to relax during the day. Follow this with a relaxation session in the beauty salon. Breakfast and dinner can be enjoyed in the main restaurant, which is next to the swimming pool, and boasts a large terrace. During the day, you can sample a light snack or an à la carte lunch by the pool.

name: H10 Ocean Dreams Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Las Palmeras, 2, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: H10 Ocean Dreams Only Adults features an outdoor pool as well as a pool-side bar. It is also steps from Corralejo's popular attractions. Guests of the hotel can unwind with a range of relaxation amenities at Despacio Thalasso Centre, which features a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available for those wishing to stay online while travelling. Just minutes from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover what the local nightlife has to offer. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a rain shower, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They feature slippers, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. H10 Ocean Dreams Only Adults's in-house restaurant, Restaurant Citrus, is a popular spot to have a meal. H10 Ocean Dreams Only Adults is near eateries and shops, as well as Waikiki Nightclub. The staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Corralejo.Revato

name: H10 Gran Tinerfe
address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina 13, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Gran Tinerfe is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the casino and Bar Discoteca Teide nightclub. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities available, such as an outdoor pool, billiards and a sauna. H10 Gran Tinerfe is an adults-only hotel. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They also offer a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests of H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel can sit down to a satisfying breakfast daily at Asensen Food & Experience, plus dinner at Los Menceyes after a day of sightseeing. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and El Mirador Brasserie. There is also a variety of beverages to choose from at the outdoor bar, which offers a view of the beach. There are a range of cafés and restaurants close to H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel Tenerife, and Adeje and Costa Adeje are a brief drive away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Playa de las Americas.Revato

name: Hipotels Natura Palace - Adults only
address: Urbanización Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Located on the sea front of Playa Blanca, the Natura Palace offers 2 large outdoor swimming pools set within landscaped gardens. All elegant rooms feature a balcony or terrace. This hotel includes a snack-bar and a buffet restaurant with a variety of regional, national and international dishes. The Talasso Natura Spa offers beauty treatments and facilities such as a sauna and steam room. There is also a hair salon and fitness centre with views of the Atlantic Ocean. Within Hipotels Natura Palace guests can relax with drinks in the cosy bar and also enjoy the hotel’s discotheque.

name: Villa Vik - Hotel Boutique
address: Calle Hermanos Diaz Rijo, 11, 35500 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Villa VIK - Hotel Boutique is situated in a quiet residential area of Playa del Cable, just 200 metres from the beach. The guest rooms are stylish and spacious and all feature a luxury private bathroom and a balcony or terrace where you can unwind. Guests can sample some culinary delights in the à la carte restaurant and to follow enjoy an exotic cocktail in the bar. Playa del Cable is a 300 metre stretch of fine golden sands and calm waters. In addition the hotel is conveniently situated for the islands airport.

name: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Pueblos, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is set on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It is also moments from Playa de las Americas's well-known tourist spots. Guests staying at Coral Ocean View - Adults Only can enjoy taking a dip in the swimming pool, working out in the gym or relaxing with a drink in the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can help with booking tours and tickets. Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is an adults-only hotel. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a kitchenette, a private balcony and a refrigerator. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities such as slippers and bathrobes. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. Local attractions close to the hotel include Aqualand Costa Adeje, Siam Park and The Patch. Those wishing to discover the region are able to visit Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora - Adults Only
address: Calle La Costa, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: This adults-only oceanfront complex offers a personalised butler service in all rooms. The outdoor pool has Balinese beds and hydromassage loungers. Each room has a private terrace with ocean or garden views. The Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora is an exclusive private area of the Gran Melia Palacio de Isora. Guests have access to all hotel facilities, including a wide range of international restaurants, 8 bars, including a beach bar, a lagoon-style infinity pool, sun terrace and tennis courts. Each spacious, elegant room at the Red Level comes with a coffee machine, an iPod dock and free WiFi. Bathrooms include a hydromassage shower and an over-sized bath tub. The exclusive Red Level lounge offers free tea and coffee all day. It also includes a poolside bar service and a business centre. There is direct access to Alcalà Beach from the hotel. 40 minutes’ drive from Las Cañadas del Teide National Park, and 35 minutes from Tenerife Reina Sofia Airport. The centre of Alcalá is a 10-minute walk away. Please note that all guests at this hotel must be 16 years old or older.

name: Coral Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Calle Noelia Afonso Cabrera, 10, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Located 400 metres from the beach in Playa de las Américas, this adults-only design hotel offers a spa and outdoor pool. The rooftop terrace enjoys stunning views over the Atlantic. The Coral Suites & Spa offers stylish accommodation, decorated in bold colours. Rooms include a kitchen and a balcony. The lounge area comes with a sofa and flat-screen TV. Sunprime Coral Suites is situated near the beaches of Troya and Las Vistas. The Las Américas Golf Course is also within walking distance. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Nuevo restaurant with views over the pool. There is a poolside bar and the Lobby Bar where cocktails are available.

name: Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only
address: Noelia Afonso Cabrera, 6, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Set in the centre of Tenerife's Playa de las Américas, 5 minutes’ walk from the beach, Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only (+18) offers 2 outdoor pools, open air spa baths, sun terraces with balinese sunbeds and sports facilities. Featuring a private balcony, the modern air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV. A safe is available for an extra cost. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The property has a rooftop leisure area including an infinity pool with spa bath, sun terrace with Balinese sunbeds, fitness and wellness area, nudist area and a bar with views. It also has a library and games room in the ground floor. Serving international cuisine, the Restaurant Areca offers show cooking and a themed buffet. You can also try Santa Rosa Grill, offering an à la carte dinner. There are also several bars where you can get a snack or a drink. Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only (+18) provides a varied entertainment programme. The hotel also offers a nudist area. Reception is open 24 hours a day and there are car and bicycle rental services available. Las Américas Golf Course is a 20-minute walk from Tigotan Lovers & Friends Playa de las Americas - Adults Only, and Siam Park Water Park is less than 2 km away.

name: Hotel Hacienda Del Conde a Meliá Collection Hotel
address: Paseo Severiano Ballesteros, Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi, 3 restaurants and 2 pools, Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only is a luxury hotel located in Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife. This adults-only property has a spa centre and hot tub. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a furnished terrace, flat-screen TV with international channels, seating area with a sofa, and walk-in closet. The luxurious bathroom comes with a bath, walk-in shower, hairdryer, VIP toiletries, and double vanities. The property has an 18-hole golf course, designed by Severiano Ballesteros, as well as a free fitness centre and banquet rooms. The spa includes a thermal circuit, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free parking is provided. Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only offers bike parking, wash station, bicycle workshop and personalised cycling routes. Tenerife South Airport is 70 km from Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only.

name: Kn Hotel Arenas Del Mar - Adults Only
address: Avda. Europa, N 2, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: This adults-only design hotel is set right next to Jaquita Beach and has a well-equipped spa, available for an additional cost. The Arenas del Mar’s outdoor swimming pool and bar area have amazing sea views. There is a large outdoor terrace, a garden and a gym. Free WiFi is offered in the property. There are also several restaurants in Arenas del Mar. La Jaquita offers buffet meals while El Ancla specialises in fish dishes with a traditional Canarian twist. The pool bar offers fresh juice, snacks and cocktails. Café Babor has a terrace with views of Medano Bay. There is also a disco with shows and entertainment. Suites have a private balcony, a double bed and a sofa bed. The bathroom has a hairdryer.

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Eternity Alicante
address: Calle Del Alcalde Alfonso de Rojas 5, 03004 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set in Alicante and within 1.4 km of Postiguet Beach, Eternity Alicante has a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The 5-star hotel is located 1 km from Sorrento Harbour where guests can catch ferries to the island of Capri. Positano is a 30-minute drive away. You can book a session at the on-site paid spa (max 3 hours per session). It is possible to book a paid session at the Spa with access to the swimming pool on site. Access to Spa & Pool area is not granted to children under 16.

The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA - Adults Only also features an outdoor pool, sunbathing area, and a restaurant with a spacious terrace overlooking the sea. Dining on the terrace is available on request. The outdoor fitness area has views of the Tavolara Island. Rooms come with satellite TV and air conditioning and some also have a private balcony with table and chairs. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Scooters and cars can be rented at reception. Olbia is just 8 km away, while the airport and harbour can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Porto Cervo is approximately 30 km away.

name: Hotell Strandporten
address: Strandgatan 13, 621 56 Visby, Gotlands Lan
description: Kalk Hotel is boutique hotel located on Strandgatan, in a beautiful building from the 17th century, carefully renovated with a stylish interior and Gotland details. There are 21 rooms, all of which offer lovely light, comfortable beds from Jensen and luxurious bathrooms with limestone details from Gotland. Some rooms have a balcony with a view of the city, the sea and the beautiful park Almedalen -Perfect for enjoying the first cup of coffee in the morning, a siesta after a lovely day in Visby or why not a glass of sparkling wine before dinner at one of the town's fantastic restaurants. Breakfast buffet: We want to give you the best possible start to the day which is why we spend some special love on our breakfast buffet. For us, sustainability is important and that there is something for everyone, even if you have an allergy or have a special diet. It does not prevent us from serving you a delicious breakfast with a healthy twist. Among the freshly baked breads you will find our homemade müsli and granola, energy shots and much more. The breakfast buffet is served weekdays 07:00 - 10:00 and holidays 08:00 - 11:00. During the summer always till 11:00. The entire hotel is non-smoking. The hotel does not accept cash payment. We are looking forward at having you as our guest. Warm welcome!

name: Yggdrasil farmhotel retreat & spa

description: Yggdrasil farmhotel retreat & spa is located on Kvaløya island, 50-minutes drive from central Tromsø. Free WiFi access is available at the farm. Guests can enjoy Norwegian dishes at the on-site restaurant, based on local and organic ingredients. The accommodation options will provide you with a patio and either private or shared bathroom facilities. Some accommodation options have private kitchen facilities. All rooms offer a view. A buffet breakfast with homemade bread is available, as well as a cafe and bar. At Yggdrasiltunet, guests will find a hot tub, sauna, garden and terrace with panoramic views. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. Horses, sheep, chickens and rabbits live on the farm. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Yggdrasiltunet is 30 km from Langnes Airport. The summer ferry from Brensholmen to Botnhamn on Senja island is a 17-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Q
address: Knesebeckstr. 67, 10623 Berlin
description: Elegant rooms and studios with a unique design are offered at this design hotel, located on Berlin’s famous Kurfürstendamm shopping mile. Free Wi-Fi is offered. The air-conditioned rooms and studios at the Hotel Q! Berlin feature a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Newspapers are displayed every day, and a laptop is available for guests' use. You can relax in the modern spa area with a Japanese wash zone, a Finnish sauna, a steam bath and a sand relaxation room with underfloor heating. A range of massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. Our wellness area is open daily from 6:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. The Hotel Q!'s rich breakfast buffet is available each morning. Guests can enjoy healthy and contemporary Thai dishes in the restaurant, or relax with a cocktail at the fireplace in the stylish Fox Bar or else in the summer outside on the terrace or the green inner courtyard of the Fox Garden. Uhlandstrasse Underground Station and Savignyplatz S-Bahn Train Station are less than a 5-minute walk away.

name: Two Hotel Berlin By Axel - Adults Only
address: Bundesallee 31a, 10717 Berlin
description: This hotel offers free WiFi as well as a popular lounge. TWO Hotel Berlin by Axel lies in Berlin's gay area, near many leisure, gastronomic and shopping highlights, including the iconic Kurfürstendamm. Opened in January 2017, the TWO Hotel Berlin by Axel provides exquisitely designed rooms and junior suites. All include natural daylight and soundproofing and a bathroom with anti-fogging mirrors as well as a built-in radio. Guests can also adjust the heating, air conditioning and lighting exactly to their taste. Breakfast is available between 07:00 and 11:00 daily. The lounge on the 7th floor is a friendly meeting point for all guests, regardless of sexuality. The hotel is LGBTIQ oriented but hetero-friendly. Guests can work out for free at the Fitness by TWO Hotel Berlin 24 hours a day. The hotel is a 3-minute walk from Güntzelstrasse Underground Station and a 5-minute walk from Berliner Straße Underground Station, and most of Berlin's main attractions can be reached within a 10-minute drive by car. The TWO Hotel Berlin by Axel is 5 km from the Messe Berlin exhibition centre, 12 km from Tegel Airport and 21 km from Schönefeld Airport.

name: Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord

The Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord's Vitalis spa area with sauna and steam room is available at no extra cost. Enjoy traditional Hamburg dishes available during the day in the Windsor Restaurant and in the evening in the Störtebeker Restaurant & Bar. The spacious summer terrace invites you to relax when the weather is good. Many cycling and jogging routes are located near the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord. The Dakarweg bus stop is in front of the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord. This provides easy access to Rübenkamp S-Bahn Train Station, which is 800 metres away, heading towards the city centre.

name: Athens 1890 Hotel & Spa
address: 10 Athinaidos, Athens 105 63
description: On the outside, a neoclassical architectural jewel. Inside, a combination of comfort and minimalist aesthetics. A pairing whose fascinating differences make it unpretentiously distinctive. Athens 1890 Hotel & Spa, apart from setting its own tone in the Greek capital’s hospitality, is also the ideal starting point for exploring it: from Eirinis Square, an Athenian corner with its own pulse, it is 300 meters from Monastiraki Square and only a 10-minute walk from Syntagma and Ermou Street, the commercial heart of the city. However, if you decide to spend the day indoors, we have made sure that our facilities and flavors will accompany every moment in an ideal way. From the indoor pool and sauna to the à la carte breakfast served in the rooms and the Omnivore restaurant menu, everything is designed to offer more than just a unique hospitality experience: an amalgam of history and stories in the heart of a city where both can be found in abundance. Use of Spa Area All the reservations include a 30’ minutes complimentary entrance (only once) in Spa Area, more specifically for the pool, the sauna and the steam room. Also we provide a -15% discount in massage service, if it is cοmbined with the complimentary. These services are available upon availability and upon request.

description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Boheme Mykonos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, massage, garden. Boheme Mykonos Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

address: Ornos Beach, Ornos 846 00

name: Bill & Coo Coast Suites - Adults Only
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis 846 00
description: Located right on the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Bill & Coo Coast Suites boasts a water's edge swimming pool and a restaurant serving traditional Greek cuisine. Blending traditional Cycladic decoration with modern minimalistic touches, every suite at Bill & Coo Coast opens to a balcony with Aegean Sea views while some also enjoy pool views. Some units feature a private pool, while others feature an outdoor hot tub. Each features a seating area where a satellite, flat-screen TV is also available. Guests may also use the iPad provided. Every suite features a state of the art bathroom stocked with a shower and free toiletries. Greek & American breakfast is served. The on-site bar features an abundance of refreshments. Massage treatments can be enjoyed on request and at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos is located within approximately 4 km of Bill & Coo Coast Suites. Mykonos Port is 6 km away, while Mykonos Airport is at 4 km. Free private parking is possible on-site.

name: Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only
address: Aleomandra Ornou, Ornos
description: Situated in Ornos, the Cycladic-style Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only provides elegant accommodation with minimalist décor, a 5-minute drive from Agios Ioannis Beach. It features a swimming pool, hot tub and bar. Featuring furnishings in white hues, a seating area and Pandrosia toiletries, all accommodation types at the Casa Cook Mykonos - Adults Only have a TV, air conditioner and balcony. Most units offer views of the Aegean Sea. An array of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including hiking and snorkelling. Free WiFi is offered in all public areas and rooms. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on nearby beaches such as Ornos and Psarou. Mykonos International Airport is 4 km away. The property offers free private parking.

name: Hippie Chic Hotel
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis 84600
description: Right on the beach of Agios Ioannis, Hippie Chic Hotel features a pool and elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Guests can taste Mediterranean cuisine and seafood from the on-site restaurant or sushi from the poolside bar. Built in respect with the local architecture, all rooms and suites are fitted with king-size, Coco-mat beds and relaxing interiors. Each comes with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and mini fridge. Some units also offer unobstructed views of the Aegean Sea. The majority of rooms and suites have their own private veranda. However, this does not guarantee visual privacy, as the existence of walls and partitions would prevent the beautiful scenery of Aegean sea and Delos island, you come here to enjoy. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos Town is around 4 km away from Hippie Chic Hotel. The island’s port and airport are both 4.5 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Nomad Mykonos
address: Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Set in Kalo Livadi, 700 metres from Kalo Livadi Beach, Nomad Mykonos offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel provides a hot tub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Nomad Mykonos all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. Loulos Beach is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Mykonos Windmills is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 6 km from Nomad Mykonos.

name: Tropicana Hotel , Suites & Villas Mykonos
address: Paradise Beach, Platis Gialos
description: Located right on the famous Paradise Beach, Tropicana Hotel, Suites & Villas Mykonos is a complex offering accommodation and services for all tastes and wishes. Divided in four wings it features luxurious rock covered buildings or white washed rooms, two pools attached to pool bars for numerous refreshments as well as two infinity pools with panoramic sea view to relax throughout the day. Each elegantly furnished unit possesses air-conditioning, smart TVs with satellite access and coffee/tea making facilities. Accommodation varies to apartments that include a well-equipped kitchenette for self catering, deluxe rooms with outdoor hot tubs and suites/villas with private pools. After the amazing success of Botrini’s Santorini in the emblematic Katikies Santorini Hotel, the island of Mykonos will be boasting its very own Botrini’s Restaurant in the stunning premises of Katikies Mykonos Hotel. You will be able to enjoy a lush tropical garden with fruit trees.Breakfast is served every day for a fee, and a small convenience store just steps away. Guests will also find restaurants and bars within a 5-minute drive. Cancun’s main tourist area is 10 km from Mansion Giahn, while the ancient Mayan ruins of Tulum are a 1.5-hour drive away. Mansion Giahn is conveniently located: 10 minutes from the airport 10 minutes from Hotel Zone 10 minutes from downtown Cancun We speak your language! Mansion Giahn Bed & Breakfast has been welcoming All Booking guests since 5 Aug 2010Expedia

name: Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort Adults Only
address: Lote Rth-7-PM-II, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Located in beautiful Playa Mujeres, complete with famous white sandy beaches and stunning ocean views in a privileged gated community. This brand new, AAA Four Diamond award winning, adults-only, all-suite resort is only 35 minutes from the Cancun International Airport and 10 minutes from downtown Cancun, in an 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course. Featuring 424 suites, 9 restaurants and 7 bars; open air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze and get a tropical feeling. It features two protected flora and fauna areas where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Each of the luxurious, comfortable suites are finely appointed with wood elements and spacious terraces.  All Secrets Playa Mujeres guests have the opportunity to enjoy Exchange Privileges (Free flow access) to Dreams Playa Mujeres, located next door, adding 10 restaurants and 13 bars options. Ticket Package

name: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres
address: Carr Punta Sam - Isla Blanca,Mz 2, Lt 10, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres offers the perfect backdrop for romantic relaxation and exploration, situated along a secluded strip of idyllic oceanfront coast, only 12 miles north of Cancun and a short drive to championship golf and a variety of historical local attractions. This all-adult, luxury property resides on an expansive and pristine white-sand beach with crystal-clear waters and features 507 modern suites each embellished with handmade art and furnishings crafted from organic, locally sourced materials, providing a truly authentic experience. The elevated Preferred Club accommodations provide an extra level of luxury with upgraded amenities and exclusive access to the Preferred Club Lounge, an oceanfront Beach Bar and a unique pool surrounded by lush vegetation. Indulge with Unlimited-Luxury®, where everything is included. Astonish your palate with limitless gourmet dining, sip top-shelf spirits served at our elegant bars and lounges and enjoy a wide variety of entertainment offered both day and night. From calming beachfront infinity pools overlooking the ocean to an engaging activities pool offering excitement throughout the day, there is something for everyone. Wind down with a specialty treatment at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia®, delight in evening shows at the theater or try one of our culinary experiences from wine and tequila tastings to cooking classes.Sembo

name: Hotel Blue Star Cancun
address: 102 Palenque 26, 77509 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Blue Star Cancun features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room comes with a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Blue Star Cancun. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Beto Avila Stadium, Cancun Bus Station and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 18 km from Hotel Blue Star Cancun, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Hotel Sante
address: 55A Jagiellonska, 03-301 Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: Hotel Sante features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Praga Pólnoc district of Warsaw. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation offers free shuttle service, room service and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. At Hotel Sante the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and ironing service at the property. Warsaw Uprising Monument is 4.6 km from the accommodation, while Jewish Ghetto Memorial is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 14 km from Hotel Sante.

name: Hotel Arche Geologiczna
address: ul Geologiczna 4, 02-246 Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: Hotel Arche Geologiczna in Warsaw provides adults-only accommodation with a bar and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel is furnished in industrial style. There is a Wydawka restaurant on site, where the guests can enjoy dishes of traditional Polish cuisine and continental breakfast served every day. Blue City is 5 km from Hotel Arche Geologiczna, while Warsaw Uprising Museum is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 3.8 km from the accommodation.

name: The Loft Hotel - Adults Only
address: Dietla 113, 33-332 Krakow, Malopolskie
description: A stay at The Loft Hotel - Adults Only places you in the heart of Krakow, within a 15-minute walk of Main Market Square and St. Mary's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is 0.5 mi (0.9 km) from Cloth Hall and 0.7 mi (1.1 km) from Krakow Barbican. Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Enjoy pizza at Incredibile, a theme restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to noon. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring tablet computers and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and minibars, as well as phones with free local calls.FarePortal

name: Avonmore House
address: South Abbey, Youghal
description: Located at the entrance of Youghal Harbour, Avonmore House B&B is set in a Georgian house, on the grounds of a former Franciscan Abbey. It is just off a 5-mile sandy beach and less than 3 minutes’ walk from the city centre. With free Wi-Fi, the guest rooms come with a TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. They also have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and bathtub or shower. Local activities include fishing in the River Blackwater, sailing, angling and yachting. Guided tours can also be arranged in the area and Youghal Golf Club is less than 2 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Farnham Estate Spa and Golf Resort
address: Farnham Estate, Cavan
description: In 1,300 acres of country estate, the luxurious Farnham Estate Spa and Golf Resort has a spa with an outdoor infinity pool, forest walkways and an 18-hole golf course. Cavan Town is 3 km away. The Farnham Estate Spa and Golf Resort has elegant, individually decorated rooms with stunning countryside views. They feature en suite bathrooms and include flat-screen LCD TVs and free Wi-Fi. There are fantastic amenities on offer at the adult Spa Centre including a sauna, steam room, mud chamber and ice fountain. Use of the Water Mint Thermal Suite and the leisure facilities is included in the price. The Farnham Estate Spa and Golf Resort’s restaurant overlooks Farnham Lawn and uses the finest local produce in its menu, while The Wine Goose Cellar Bar and Lobby Bar serves daily bar food menus and offers an extensive wine list. Afternoon tea is also available daily in the main drawing room of Farnham House. Bikes and fishing rods are available to hire.

name: Arthurs Holiday Villa
address: 6 Nestle Court, Arthurs Seat, VIC 3936
description: No description found

name: Sunny Side Up B&B
address: 39 Locksley Road, Rye, VIC 3941
description: A hot tub and an outdoor dining area are offered at Sunny Side Up B&B. Free WiFi and free private parking is included in all rooms. Rye CBD is 15 minutes' walk away and Peninsula Hot Springs is 8 minutes’ drive. Contemporary wood accents, white linens and coloured accents are offered in all rooms at Sunny Side Up B&B Rye. Bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries are also included in all rooms. High fences seclude the backyard lounge area, hot tub and BBQ facilities. Private check-in services are offered. The property offers a 3 course breakfast. Located along the beach, the Bay Trail offers hiking and biking opportunities just 9 minutes’ walk away. Moonah Link Golf Club is 10 minutes’ drive away from Sunny Side Up B&B Rye.

name: Bunk Brisbane
address: 11 Gipps Street, Brisbane, QLD 4006
description: Bunk Brisbane A comfortable, vibrant place to stay in Fortitude Valley. Bunk offers a mix of spacious dorm, double and twin private ensuite rooms in an old factory building on the edge of Brisbane’s CBD and Fortitude Valley. Spanning five levels, accommodation features high ceilings, large windows, natural finishes, original wooden floorboards and an industrial vibe throughout. Bunk shared and private rooms All rooms have been renovated and re-designed for those who love to travel. Bunks are positioned to capitalise on space, light and privacy, using room dividers where possible, and some ensuites have a separate toilet. We’ve also added little extras that make all the difference to your stay — like privacy screening and antibacterial air conditioning throughout the building, with personal reading lights and two power points per guest. Please note - our bar and pool area will be undergoing renovation works from 15/05/2023 - the end of November 2023. During the week there may be construction noise and inconvenience. Prices for this period have been adjusted down to reflect this inconvenience.

name: Rosebridge House Bed & Breakfast Adult Retreat
address: 86 Williams Street, Gooseberry Hill, WA 6076
description: Rosebridge House Bed & Breakfast Adult Retreat has 6 rooms and features a swimming pool. This charming bed & breakfast is situated in Gooseberry Hill. Rosebridge House Bed & Breakfast Adult Retreat provides its guests with free private parking on site, as well as free Wi-Fi to make the most of throughout their stay. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities on offer, such as a BBQ/picnic area and bicycle rental. Rooms at Rosebridge House Bed & Breakfast Adult Retreat feature coffee makers, power showers and luxury linen, and some provide direct access to the pool. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a hair dryer and luxury toiletries. Rooms are also air conditioned and soundproofed. A satisfying breakfast is prepared each morning at the bed & breakfast, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. Rosebridge House Bed & Breakfast Adult Retreat is under a 10-minute car ride from Perth Airport.Revato

name: Ganesha Wellness Spa
address: 16 Kensington Street, Perth, WA 6004
description: Located in quiet East Perth, walking distance from Swan River and Optus Stadium, Ganesha Wellness Spa provides boutique accommodation and boasts a day spa, a sunny terrace and free WiFi. Guests enjoy luxurious suites with free continental breakfast. The suites include tea and coffee making facilities and free WiFi. Each suite has a bathroom with a bathrobe and free toiletries. Some suites have a private balcony and a spa bath. You can enjoy a range of treatments and packages in the Luxe Day Spa. The 3 guest lounges are perfect for relaxing with friends. The continental breakfast is offered with all bookings and includes yoghurt, cereals, orange juice and fresh fruit. The property also offers a communal kitchenette with a toaster, a kettle, a fridge and a freezer. Ganesha Wellness Spa is 8 minutes’ walk from Claisebrook Train Station, and 3 km from Perth CBD (Central Business District). Perth Arena is a 10-minute drive, and Perth Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Eagle Foundry Bed & Breakfast
address: 23-25 King Street Street, Tanunda, SA 5118
description: Stay in the luxury of these self contained suites. All rooms feature quality fittings with an antique Australian quality. Four Suites are available, our Foundry Suite, the totally unique Thomson Suite, our modern Blacksmiths Anvil Suite and our most luxurious Blacksmiths Forge Suite. FOUNDRY SUITE: A modern King bed bed is located at one end of this heritage studio suite and a functional kitchenette at the opposite end completes the experience. There is also an en-suite bathroom, set of comfortable leather lounge chairs, rustic dining table and slow combustion wood heater located in this suite. For guests comfort, there is a quiet split system reverse cycle air conditioner and ceiling fan. There are two LCD television's that can be viewed from the bed or the lounge area plus there is a DVD player with a selection of movies for your entertainment pleasure. The compact kitchenette has a full 4 burner stove with oven, fridge, microwave oven, plus all the frypans, crockery and cutlery necessary for you to cook your own meals. All guests receive port and chocolates along with full breakfast provisions which are included in our “value for money” accommodation package. All linen plus other items like hairdryer, iron, ironing board, soaps and toiletries are there for your use This suite is suitable for a couple’s romantic escape or for a single business person looking to find something better and more unique than your average motel type of accommodation. THOMSON SUITE: This is our largest and most impressive suite and is suitable for up to 6 guests. The Thomson suite has one bedroom that has a character Australian queen bed plus a LCD television in the room. There is a separate kitchen, lounge room and bathroom in this suite. The large open plan lounge room has a pool table, single and trundle bed, plus the sofa folds into a double bed if required. Another LCD television plus DVD player with movies are provided in this room and the slow combustion wood fire adds that special charm on those chilly winter evenings. For guests added comfort there is a split system reverse cycle air conditioner as well as two ceiling fans. The Jarrah bar area and granite fireplace surround are impressive features of the room. The kitchen is functional and has all modern items like, 4 hot plate stove with electric oven, large fridge, pantry and microwave oven. This suite is also suitable for guests that need wheelchair access as it has grab rails in the toilet and shower. We can also supply shower seating and other bathroom items for guests that require these items. Both suites have access to the tranquil gardens of the courtyard where guests can experience the heated spa pool or sit leisurely by the central fountain to read the selection of books and magazines that are provided in the suites. The Thomson suite is suitable for family groups, wheelchair guests, company representatives and anyone looking to find accommodation in Gawler that is both pleasurable and totally unequaled. Guests are invited to enjoy the large stone walled courtyard containing a BBQ area and spa which is delightfully set among sprawling vines and greenery. BLACKSMITHS ANVIL SUITE: One of our newest suites. This studio suite has a welcoming feel as soon as you walk in the door. Tastefully decorated in recycled timber for the kitchen cupboards and wardrobe, this suite features a modern bathroom and king bed. The sofa is a luxurious leather lounge and the kitchen is compact and modern. There is a smart TV, DVD player with movies, split system air conditioner and complimentary Wi-Fi. Parking is undercover on the paved driveway. BLACKSMITHS FORGE SUITE: If you are looking for total luxury in Gawler then you cant go past this suite. It features a beautiful bathroom with large shower and spa bath, a king bed in the bedroom and a separate toilet area. The lounge sofas are soft leather and there are 2 LCD Smart TV's in the suite. There is also a DVD player with movies for you to enjoy. The kitchen is modern with a glass hotplate cook top and a under bench oven. There is a large refrigerator and dishwasher here as well. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available. This suite can sleep up to 4 guests by utilizing the king bed in the bedroom and the sofa bed in the lounge room. Undercover car parking on the paved driveway is available. Locality Within walking distance to the main street of Gawler, restaurants and local pubs. Also nearby a large Coles and Big W shopping complex. Close enough to the Gawler Central railway station to walk but far enough so you don't get the noise of the trains. Golf course and swimming pool also within walking distance. Property The property was established as an Iron casting Foundry in 1870 by David Thomson and has been in the Thomson family until around 1969. A lot of the original foundry still remains and there are samples of their craft with many of the old implements adorning the walls. The property is set on 3/4 of an acre and has large gum and native trees that attract birds of all species. The old world charm has been captured in the layout of the suites and the surrounding buildings.VRBO

name: Wine and Roses Bed and Breakfast
address: 39 Caffrey Street, Mclaren Vale, SA 5171
description: Nestled amongst rose gardens, Wine and Roses Bed and Breakfast offers free WiFi and free breakfast provisions. Located on the edge of the McLaren Vale township, Shiraz cycling and walking trail is just 20 m away. Guests can enjoy a short stroll into the main street with various restaurants, cafes and cellar doors. Historical village of Willunga is 8 km away from the property and along the way views of vineyards and hilly landscapes can be enjoyed. All rooms offer free port, fresh fruit, chocolate, magazines, fresh flowers (subject to availability) and coffee pods for the coffee machine. All are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV and a Blu-Ray player. The en suite bathroom offers a fluffy bathrobe and free toiletries. Some rooms feature a private balcony or courtyard with BBQ facilities. Some have a spa bath and a kitchenette. All suites feature a fireplace. The provisions for cooked breakfast includes a selection of bacon, eggs, mushroom, toast, yoghurt and juice.

name: Amongst the Vines Deluxe Retreat
address: 477 Blewitt Springs Road, Mclaren Vale, SA 5171
description: Our luxury self-contained accommodation caters for 2-6 adults (2 Queen sized bedrooms and 1 Standard twin) on a 100 acre property featuring our organic vineyard, grazing pastures and a natural bush setting. Located in picturesque Blewitt Springs, it is just 50 minutes south of Adelaide in the famous McLaren Vale wine district. Nearby are numerous cellar doors and restaurants with many more to visit throughout the region. Our working winery also produces a portfolio of wines to select from and we offer tastings in our cellar door by appointment. As one of the parcels of land given to the returned soldiers following World War 1, this property is a piece of local history. We have stylishly renovated the 1930’s cottage into a beautiful space which features it's original charm with modern comforts. It sits on an elevated position boasting sweeping views across the vineyard and farmland out to the Mt Lofty Ranges. Guests are treated to a stunning vista which spans as far as the eye can see and the purpose built gazebo provides the ideal spot to take in the picturesque beauty, enjoy the tranquillity and marvel at the abundance of bird life amongst natural surroundings. This luxury country escape offers the option of staying in and creating your own private experience or getting out and exploring the 80 cellar doors on offer in the McLaren Vale wine region. With more than one third offering local produce as part of the tasting experience - from high-end, starred restaurants to casual platters - there is a wine and food combination to suit any taste. Features of Amongst the Vines Deluxe Retreat includes: - Fully equipped kitchen and generous provisions for cooked breakfast each morning - Modern bathroom with spa bath - Luxurious linen, plush towels, bathrobes and complimentary toiletries - Complimentary bottle of our award winning wine with access to the full selection in the cellar below the house - Ducted reverse cycle air conditioning throughout - Covered alfresco area with gas BBQ and heater - Flat screen TV, Stereo and DVD player - Wood burning combustion heater - Purpose built gazebo in a beautiful garden with stunning views over the vineyard - Adjacent to the National Park with diverse hiking trails - Peaceful seclusion amongst unspoilt natural beauty - Working winery and wine tasting by appointment Whether you're a couple or group of friends looking to get away, this cottage offers the perfect place to unwind, take in the picturesque rural views and enjoy it's seclusion and charm. Settle in with a glass of wine or access the many attractions on our doorstep from world-class wines, culinary experiences and pristine natural environments. We invite you to share in this magical experience.VRBO

name: Windsurfer Resort
address: 452 Marine Parade, Biggera Waters, QLD 4216
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, table tennis, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Springbrook Mountain Chalets
address:
9.4
Wonderful
477 reviews
description: Set on 14 acres alongside the UNESCO World Heritage listed Springbrook Plateau, Springbrook Mountain Chalets offers accommodation with a patio and a hot tub or spa bath. Located in the Gold Coast hinterland, Springbrook Mountain Chalets are 45 minutes’ drive from Coolangatta and various Gold Coast beaches. There are several walking and hiking trails throughout the property. Surrounded by tall trees and a variety of wildlife, each chalet and cottage features a fully equipped kitchen and a lounge area with a sofa and flat-screen TV. Some accommodation also features a fireplace. Guests can enjoy an outdoor meal using the BBQ facilities, or play a game on the badminton court. There is a large free DVD library located at reception.

name: 424 Trees Tiny Home
address: 424 Trees Road, Tallebudgera, QLD 4228
description: 424 Trees Tiny Home in Tallebudgera provides adults-only accommodation with a rooftop pool, a spa and wellness centre and a garden. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. The units come with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and a wardrobe. Every room has a private bathroom with a hot tub, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the guest house the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. 424 Trees Tiny Home offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna, a hot tub and a wellness packages. Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary is 12 km from the accommodation, while Burleigh Head National Park is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast, 21 km from 424 Trees Tiny Home, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grande Vue Private Hotel
address: 8, Mona Street, Hobart, TAS 7004
description: This historic property was built in 1906 and has been refurbished to highlight the original fireplaces and stained glass windows. There is a comfortable lounge room where guests can enjoy a pre-dinner drink or morning and afternoon tea. Free WiFi is provided. The Grande Vue is located in the historic suburb of Battery Point, within 15 minutes’ walk of Salamanca Place and Wrest Point Casino. Guests can explore a variety of local wineries, and the unique wilderness areas south of Hobart. The accommodation features antique furniture and modern amenities. Each individually designed room offers a marble bathroom with heated towel rails, a mini bar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms include spectacular water views, and a spa bath.

name: Kurrara Historic Guest House
address: 17 Coomonderry Street, Katoomba, NSW 2780
description: No description found

name: The Quarter Chaophraya By Uhg
address: 1190 Soi Somdet Chao Phraya 17, Bangkok 10600
description: Situated in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Arun, The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and organising tours for guests. Rooms include a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony and some have city views. At the hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG, and car hire is available. Staff speak English, Thai and Filipino at the reception. Wat Pho is 4.2 km from the hotel, while Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG.

name: 41 Suite Bangkok
address: 2/39-41 Soi Sukhumvit 41 (Pirom) Klongton Nua, Wattana, Bangkok 10110
description: Situated in the heart of Bangkok City’s Sukhumvit area, this non-smoking boutique property is surrounded by entertainment options. It offers a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and rooms with free Wi-Fi access. 41 Suite Bangkok is within 500 metres of Prompong Skytrain Station, Benjasin Central Park and Emporium Department Store. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Featuring wooden flooring and wall art, modern air-conditioned rooms at 41 Suite are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. In addition to a personal safe, a minibar and a light meal are included. 41 Club Restaurant serves a variety of Thai specialities and European favourites. Refreshing drinks are also available here.

name: Shewe Wana Boutique Hotel
address: 296, 298 Charoenmuang Road, Chiang Mai
description: Set amidst a beautiful landscaped garden, Shewe Wana Boutique Resort and Spa offers a tropical retreat in central Chiang Mai. It offers full spa services, an outdoor pool and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy one-way shuttle to various attractions in Chiang Mai free of charge. Shewe Wana Boutique Resort and Spa is a 10-minute walk from Naowarat Bridge and a 20-minute walk from Chiang Mai Old City. With just a short walk, guests will find a variety of international restaurants, pubs and café along the Ping River. For extra convenience, the resort also offers free tuk-tuk shuttle services to Chiang Mai Night Bazzar and Chiang Mai Railway Station. The cosy air-conditioned rooms feature locally-made furnishings using natural materials. Each is equipped with a cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms come with a hairdryer and shower facilities. Guests can join a yoga class or indulge in a relaxing massage at the spa. The resort also provides a tour desk and laundry services. Aside from a daily breakfast, the 2 on-site restaurants serve a variety of vegetarian, Thai and European dishes. The restaurants also feature garden views and various customized menus like gluten-free meals, which is available upon request.

name: Rachamankha Hotel
address: 6 Rachamankha 9, Phra Singh, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Rachamankha a Member of Relais & Chateaux is located by the Old City Wall in Chiang Mai, only 100 metres to the Sunday Market. The hotel offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and flat-screen TVs. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with DVD players, a personal safe and a minibar. En suite bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel features laundry services, a tour desk and massage services at Pool Spa. Computers and internet access are available at the hotel's library. The courtyard restaurant serves a daily breakfast and offers Asian, Chinese, European and American cuisines. Rachamankha a Member of Relais & Chateaux is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport.

name: The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only (SHA Extra Plus)
address: 14 Kata Noi Rd., Karon 83100
description: Featuring an infinity pool, The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus is situated in Karon and offers luxury accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Serenity Spa and Fitness centre. The resort has a fitness centre with an infinity pool. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. The resort also has its very own fitness centre, Sea Pool. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has air conditioned rooms with a mini bar, slippers and a coffee maker. They feature an in-room dining area, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus's on-site restaurants, then later sit down to international dishes at The Harbor or Thai cuisine at Param Para. Eateries at the resort include The Nest Beach Club and Romantic in Villa. A selection of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has easy access to Kata Beach and Kata Viewpoint. Guests are able to visit Rawai and Patong, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Hotel Verdigris
address: 154 Yaowarat Road Phuket Old Town, Phuket City 83000
description: Located in Phuket Town, 700 metres from Thai Hua Museum, Hotel Verdigris provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Providing a bar, the property is located within less than 1 km of Chinpracha House. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, Asian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Hotel Verdigris offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Prince of Songkla University is 5 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Temple is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 30 km from Hotel Verdigris.

name: Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa
address: 31/10 Naithon Beach Road, Sakhu 83110
description: Set in Nai Thon Beach, a few steps from Nai Thon Beach, Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 2.5 km from Banana Beach, 9.3 km from Blue Canyon Country Club and 12 km from Wat Prathong. The resort has a hot tub, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. At the resort all rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and a balcony with a sea view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 15 km from Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa, while Splash Jungle Water Park is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort (SHA Plus+)
address: 99/4 Moo 7, Soi Mangosteen, Rawai 83130
description: Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus offers relaxing stays set on a peaceful hillside. It boasts a 680m² outdoor pool with a jetted pool, spa and free shuttles to Nai Harn Beach. Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus is a 15-minute drive from Kata Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surrounded by tropical greenery, spacious villa-style rooms feature a private balcony and outdoor rain showers. They have free WiFi and a sofa at the seating area. Guests can get a good workout at the well-equipped gym or enjoy relaxing massages at Ayurveda Destination Spa. Other facilities include a tour desk, gift shop and library. Boasting stunning sea views, the property's restaurant serves Thai Mediterranean specialities in a casual setting. There is also a wine cellar.

name: Bluesotel Smart Krabi Aonang Beach - Adults Only
address: 1077 Aonang Soi 15, Moo 2, Aonang, Krabi 81180
description: When you stay at BlueSotel SMART Krabi Aonang Beach - Adults only - SHA Extra Plus in Krabi, you'll be by the sea, a 1-minute drive from Ao Nang Beach and 5 minutes from West Railay Beach. Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Krabi? This hotel has facilities measuring 3321 square feet (308.5 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Explorar Koh Samui - Adults Only Resort and Spa
address: 44/134 Moo 1, Koh Samui 84330
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, Sensimar Koh Samui puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, fireplace, infirmary, are at hand. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, fireplace, free welcome drink. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including snorkeling, private beach, fitness center, outdoor pool, water sports (non-motorized). For reliable service and professional staff, Sensimar Koh Samui caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Absolute Sanctuary
address: 88 Moo 5 Tambol Bophut, Amphur, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in a secluded hillside area in Choeng Mon, Absolute Sanctuary is a premiere wellness resort offering yoga and detox programmes. It features an infinity-edge pool, yoga studio and spa. Furnished with traditional Moroccan designs, air-conditioned rooms at Absolute Sanctuary have a private terrace with views of the Gulf of Thailand or the pool. Each is fitted with a fridge and safety deposit box. Let an expert massage therapist soothe your body, or relax in the steam room. There is also a fitness room as well as a yoga studio offering Pilates reformer classes. In the mini-theatre, watch health education videos during the day, or Hollywood movies in the evenings. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The on-site restaurant and bar offers a healthy and tasty super food meals and a extensive drink menu. Absolute Sanctuary is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport. Free airport transfers are provided for selected room types.

name: Layana Resort & Spa
address: 272 Moo 3 Saladan, Ko Lanta 81150
description: Layana Resort and Spa is located in Ko Lanta and offers free Wi-Fi. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Linger Longer Spa and Wellness Pool. Guests staying at Layana Resort and Spa can enjoy taking a dip in the outdoor pool, working out in the fitness centre or unwinding with a drink in the bar. Guests can try out the recreational facilities on offer, such as a sauna and a playground. There is also free private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is equipped with an iPod docking station, a mini bar and a refrigerator. All are air conditioned and provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a flat-screen TV. Layana Resort houses Seasky, which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides guests with all they need for an enjoyable night within the resort. Located within a short walk of Layana Resort And Spa Koh Lanta is Serenity Massage and Spa. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Ko Lanta.Revato

name: Mai Holiday by Mai Khao Lak
address: 9/17 Petchkasem Rd., Moo 1 Kuk Kak, Khao Lak 82190
description: Situated in Khao Lak, 2.8 km from Bang Sak Beach, Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and luggage storage for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. An American breakfast is available each morning at Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for canoeing. Tsunami Memorial - Rue Tor 813 is 20 km from the accommodation, while Sairung Waterfall is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 91 km from Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone.

name: Khaolak Oriental Resort - Adult Only
address: 13/120 Moo 7, Khao Lak
description: Khaolak Oriental Resort - Adult Only is located on Nangthong Beach, within 15 minutes’ drive of the Khao Lak National Park. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool, a spa bath and well-equipped gym. Rooms at Khaolak Resort are decorated with Oriental-style furnishings. Every room comes with a private balcony or terrace, a tea and coffee maker and satellite TV. Some rooms offer direct access to the pool. The in-house restaurant serves a buffet breakfast. For lunch and dinner it features a varied menu and seafood dishes. The pool-side bar is an ideal place for enjoying light snacks and cocktails. As well as free onsite parking, the Oriental Resort has free internet throughout the hotel and a 24-hour front desk. Just a boat ride away, guests can find snorkeling at Pakarang Reef and the Similan Islands. The town of Takuapa is a 30-minute drive away and the property is approximately 80 km from Phuket International Airport.

name: Sheraton Hua Hin Pranburi Villas
address: 9/22 Moo 5 Tambol Paknampran, Hua Hin 77220
description: Find Sheraton Hua Hin Pranburi Villas in an alluring destination with transformative facilities ready for a romantic couples getaway. Our quiet Hua Hun luxury hotel is nestled on the lush beaches of the Gulf of Thailand and near historic Pranburi sites, including the Chao Mae Tubtim Thong Shrine. Host your next business retreat, wedding or event in Hua Hin at our versatile indoor hotel. Enjoy a variety of on-site dining options, including rooftop seating for views of Pranburi or alfresco pavilions surrounded by lily ponds. Relax poolside with a refreshing cocktail or explore Hua Hin on wheels with our complimentary bike rental program. Challenge yourself with a workout in our modern fitness center, open 24/7. Our hotel's 53 villas include a private swimming pool, sunken outdoor bathtub, and breathtaking ocean views for your complete privacy. Expand your horizons in Pranburi, Thailand, with Sheraton.Marriott

Rooms. The top floor has a restaurant with an overwhelming view of the 3-story atrium, a spa where you can experience the blessings of the Japanese land and the four seasons in a superb view, and a penthouse with 5 rooms that welcomes guests with high-quality hospitality. ”. Relax in a unique space with a 360-degree panoramic view.Rakuten

address: Tokyo Midtown 9-7-1 Akasaka Minato-ku, Tokyo 107-6245
description: Occupying the top nine floors of the 53-story Midtown Tower in the Roppongi District, the capital’s entertainment and design-related business hub, The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo features 245 elegantly appointed guest rooms. Guests at our luxury hotel in Tokyo, Japan can enjoy an indoor pool, a soothing spa and a floor dedicated to health and wellness. Our business hotel in Tokyo also features reimagined meeting spaces with free Wi-Fi available throughout the property. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, a luxurious welcome awaits at The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo.Marriott

description: Designed for adults only, Lotus Hotel & Spa is a love hotel located a 15-minute walk away from Takeda Subway Station. The love hotel offers guests spacious rooms to relax in. Rooms have erotic items and TV channels and a computer connected to the internet. Guests can enjoy Balinese oil massages at the spa. Dinner is not served on the property, but guests can bring their own dinners or dine out. Breakfast is served in the guest rooms. Fushimi Inari is a 15-minute walk away, while the Shijo/Kawaramachi area is within a 16-minute taxi ride from the property. Kinkakuji (Golden Pavilion) is accessible within a 30-minute taxi ride.

address: Nakagyo-ku Hanatatecho 255-1, Kyoto 604-0003
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and an outdoor private bath, as well as a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, down comforters, and towels.Expedia

They boast a combined air conditioning and air cleaning unit, while toiletries are provided. Hotel Sakura Terrace offers a restaurant and a bar counter. Spacious public baths, male-only saunas and female-only ceramic-bed sauna are available. Guests can enjoy a complimentary welcome drink at the bar counter. Kyoto Tower is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while Toji Temple is a 15-minute walk. The property is a 1-minute walk to the bus stop for Kiyomizu-dera Temple/Gion area, and a 3-minute walk to the bus stop for Kinkaku-ji Temple.

address: 1255 West Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: This South Beach hostel is centrally located 10 minutes’ walk from the beach and Lincoln Road District mall, restaurants, and bars. name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
address: 40 Island Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

description: The 5-star Trident Bandra Kurla provides an outdoor swimming pool and full spa services. Concierge services and room service are available 24 hours. On-site parking is free. Complimentary WiFi is available in all rooms. Stylish with accents of red, the air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD Player and iPod connections. A well-stocked minibar and a personal safe are also included. En suite bathrooms come with either a shower or a bathtub. Trident Bandra Kurla is located in North Mumbai, a 15-minute drive from the domestic airport. It is a 20-minute drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and a 40-minute drive from Western Railway Terminus. Botticino restaurant serves fine wine and Italian dishes, while 022 restaurant offers an interactive sushi bar, as well as Western and Asian food. Other dining options include regional Indian food at Maya restaurant and salads at Trident Patisserie & Delicatessen. At Trident Spa & Fitness Centre, guests can look forward to relaxing massage treatments or a good workout at the gym. The hotel also provides a business centre and a souvenir shop.

Minibars and tea/coffee makers are provided. En suite bathrooms offer toiletries and hairdryers. Guests can visit the business centre for their communication needs. Car rental services are available for those seeking to take a drive. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also provided in the hotel. A variety of international cuisine can be enjoyed at Tiara Restaurant. Drinks are served in the bar.

address: 4000059 Sahar, Andheri (East), Mumbai, Mumbai 400 059

The hotel also provides a well-equipped fitness centre and 24-hour room service. The 24-hour Citrus Restaurant serves international food in a casual setting, while fine Indian dining can be enjoyed at Jamavar. Alternatively, Chinese cuisine, Italian delights and drinks are available at The Leela's 4 other dining options.

description: Regal Enclave is near the Khar Railway Station, near various shopping arcades, and within easy reach of Mumbai’s business district. It offers an airport pick-up service, an internet café and free Wi-Fi is available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV and personal safe. Tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are included. Indian, Continental and Chinese cuisine is served daily at the hotel’s restaurant. A variety of drinks are available at the lounge. Free tea service in the morning can be delivered to rooms. The property offers 24-hour room service. Hotel Regal Enclave is 1 km from the Arabian Sea coast and only a short drive away from the international and domestic airport. It is 3 km to the business hub of Bandra Kurla Complex. description: Enjoy the peaceful ambience of our uncluttered, glass-walled lobby before checking into your modern guest room. From this accommodation near Mumbai airport, you can see planes jet off from the runway and the skyline of the city from the hotel's rooftop swimming pool. Our grand pillarless ballroom can hold up to 500 people for your social or corporate event & The Sky Terrace is the perfect sunset venue for a grand golden hour event or pool parties. We are close to businesses in commercial north Mumbai, such as corporate headquarters at the Bandra Kurla Complex, 8km away, the Accenture offices, 3.5km away, WNS Global Services, 6km away, Bombay Exhibition Centre at Goregaon, 8km away, SEEPZ, 4.8km away and the commercial hub of MIDC at 7km.See the colonial grandeur of the iconic Gateway of India archway at Mumbai Harbour, where ferries leave for the hand-carved Elephanta Caves on Gharapuri Island at 25km from the hotel. Your sophisticated guest room comes with an iPod docking station, complimentary Wi-Fi access and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. Unwind with a workout in the sunlit Gym and detox in the sauna's.
