The dining options at our 5-star hotel reflect India's rich and diverse culinary traditions. Sample global cuisines and curated menus designed to satisfy even the most discerning diner's palate. description: Kanan Tulum is a unique eco-friendly spa hotel in Mexico's Caribbean coast. Located on the beach amid the Mayan jungle, it is placed in the middle of the bustling music and art scene, offering a wide range of events in and around the hotel. This adults-only hotel is an experience in its own right, marrying rustic elements with the finest woods and rich textiles.The labyrinth of treetop corridors, wooden staircases, nature portals and branch-woven walkways and nests, all create a sensation of a hidden jungle temple. Get pampered at Kumaru Spa, featuring a full menu of organic services, find adventure on the Caribbean Sea, with an array of beach activities available on-site or enjoy a delightful yoga class at our wooden yoga shala. Indulge in authentic gastronomy, locally sourced dining and drinks, including cocktails at our swim-up pool bar and drinks on our rooftop lounge. Stay tuned for our music events on weekends at our beach club featuring the finest DJs lineups. When you’re ready to explore and experience the magic of Tulum, you’ll find everything from the ancient Mayan ruins and scenic cenotes to unforgettable nature reserves and adventure parks within minutes of our hotel. Take the vacation you deserve at Tulum’s best environmentally conscious, adults-only Caribbean escape at Kanan Tulum

The units have a unique Mayan mosaic bath tub where you can have a special invigorating bath in rich mineralized cenote’s water, which is considered as sacred water within Mayan culture. description: The Reef 28 - Adults Only - All Suites - Optional Gourmet All Inclusive酒店位于普拉亚德尔卡曼市中心，设有室外游泳池和健身中心，距离ADO国际巴士站（ADO International Bus Station）和普拉亚卡门海运码头（Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal）等景点仅有很短的路程，提供免费WiFi和内部私人停车场。 酒店的所有套房均提供休息区和平板电视。套房配有带免费洗浴用品的私人浴室。所有套房均配备了阳台。 The Reef 28酒店设有一间供应墨西哥、美国和亚洲美食的餐厅。 酒店工作人员随时为客人提供帮助。 Reef 28酒店距离残疾人友好的海滩1.4公里。最近的机场是科苏梅尔国际机场，距离酒店19公里。

name: Ocean Riviera Paradise -El Beso- Adults Only
address: Carr Fed Chetumal Cancun km 296 Predio, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is located 5 km away from Grand Coral, 60 km away from Cancun International Airport. Facilities and services included free Wi-Fi, swimming pool, bar, restaurants, laundry services(with extra charge)car rental, outdoor parking, sports area, spa, shopping centre. Room features free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, hairdryer, desk, Ironing board and iron, complimentary safe. Address: Crta. Federal Cancun Chetumal, km 296, Manzana 020 Lt 007-1, Playa Xcalacoco 77710 Playa del Carmen, MexicoWebBeds

name: Paradisus La Perla – Adults Only
address: 5ta Avenida, Esquina Calle 112, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in a stunning little bay, the hotel is within walking distance of beaches and Playa del Carmen town centre. There is a plethora of attractions in the vicinity and the hotel is also close to famous Mayan archaeological sites such as Tulum, Chichen Itza and Coba. Paradisus La Perla Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The resort has an outdoor pool and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant Free private parking is available on site. Room Service – Included. Service charge of $5 usd per delivery applies. Royal Service categories will have the service included with no extra fee. A supplement applies to book Bali Beds located at La Perla or La Esmeralda swimming pool area.FarePortal

name: Valentin Imperial Maya - Adults Only
address: Carr.Fed.307 Chetumal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxurious resort is located 25 minutes from International Cancun Airport, 30 minutes from Cancun and only 20 minutes from Playa del Carmen. With more than half a mile white sand beach, located in Playa del Secreto (The Secret Beach) in the Riviera Maya.WebBeds

name: Secrets Maroma Beach Riviera Cancun - Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307 Chetumal-Cancún, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is situated on the coast of the Yucatan Peninsula, on one of the world's best beach. It lies a mere 50 km south of Cancun, 32 km south of Cancun International Airport and is surrounded by vibrant coral reefs, soft sand White adventurous attractions.WebBeds

name: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel by Karisma - Adults only
address: KM.95 Carretera Cancun-Tulum Kantenah, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Playa Del Carmen. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the property are 24-hour front desk, valet parking, room service, airport transfer, car hire. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort make Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In the perfect choice for your stay in Playa Del Carmen.Agoda

name: Unico 20°n 87°w - Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Manzana 22 Carretera Chetumal-Pto Juare, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Akumal, a few steps from Kantenah Beach, Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 30 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 30 km from ADO International Bus Station, the property provides a range of water sports facilities, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms have air conditioning, and some units at Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only have a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Indonesian and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play billiards at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for snorkelling. Tulum Archeological Site is 33 km from Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only, while Xel Ha is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 45 km from the resort.

name: Ocean Maya Royale - Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal, km. 299, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering endless activities, international on-site dining and full-service spa treatments, Ocean Maya Royale provides oceanfront accommodations. Guests can enjoy direct beach access in the heart of the Mayan Riviera, near Cozumel and Cancun. With an on-site scuba diving center and daily organized activities, there is something for everyone at the Ocean Maya Royale. Take advantage of the resort's nightly live entertainment or relax in one of the 2 oceanfront swimming pools. Sample a large variety of dining options while staying at the Ocean Maya Royale, including authentic Japanese cuisine and traditional Mexican dishes. The resort also features several on-site bars. In the area surrounding the Ocean Maya Royale, discover a large variety of recreational activities, including jet skiing and guided jungle tours. The area is also home to one of the world's largest coral reefs, and is ideal for scuba diving or snorkeling.

name: La Reina Roja Hotel Boutique
address: Calle 20 Entre Av. 5 Y 10, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located right in the center of downtown Playa del Carmen just a few steps away from Fifth Avenue and its famous night life, luxury shopping and dining scene where you will experience the laid back lifestyle that the Riviera Maya has to offer. The modern and provocative Avant-Garde building design together with its Pop Art conceptual decoration of each of our deluxe rooms and junior suites and thematic suites offer a unique and unforgettable experience for your vacation trip.In addition to having high luxury amenities and services for your enjoy and pleasure live a unique experience as a couple, with friends or on your business trip while discovering the original proposal that our "adults-only" hotel has to offer. Live the Reina Roja full experience with our Resort (Lifestyle) Fee,which will give you exclusive access to our luxury amenities and services for a complete vacation experience. Includes: • American Breakfast (served from 8am to 11pm) • 2x1 on all Barista drinks • Luxury amenities in the room, Wi-Fi • Environmental tax included.

name: La Pasion Hotel Boutique by Bunik
address: Calle 10 Norte Entre 15 Y 20, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Property Location With a stay at La Pasion Hotel Boutique, you'll be centrally located in Playa del Carmen, steps from Central Square and Nuestra Senora del Carmen Catholic Church. This hotel is within close proximity of Yucatek Divers and Quinta Alegria.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 28 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and ceiling fans.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Treat yourself with massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.Dining Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.WebBeds

name: La Casa de la Playa by Xcaret- All Fun Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel La Casa de la Playa is located in the vicinity of a sandy/rocky beach. The town Playa del Carmen is around 8 km away (Tulum around 50 km, Cancún around 60 km). The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Xplor (approx. 1 km away) and Xenses (approx. 1 km away). For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 55 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a free shuttle. There is also a shuttle to Parks Group Xcaret (for free). Amenities: The 3-storey beach hotel has 63 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, a lift, an air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop as well as a parking area (for free). For the meals, there are 4 restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. Room service and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 3 fresh water pools. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast a la carte. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness and aerobics. Bicycle rental. Spa area, sauna, whirlpool and massages available for a fee. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa, American Express and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Riu Palace Baja California
address: Camino Viejo a San José, Km 3.5, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, this beachfront property is next to a golf course and within 1 mi (2 km) of Islands and Protected Areas of the Gulf of California, Medano Beach, and San Lucas Bay. Marina Cabo San Lucas and Cabo Dolphins are also within 3 mi (5 km).Expedia

name: Le Blanc Spa Resort Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Km 18.4 Carretera Transpeninsular Lomas, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Los Cabos is beloved for being where the desert meets the sea. Le Blanc Spa Resort Los Cabos harnesses the breathtaking beauty of this tropical treasure while adding an air of luxurious transcendence to the experience. This stunning 373-room resort exudes elegance, escape, and intimacy. Savor an international palate of artfully prepared cuisine with 7 world-class restaurants, or toast the night in any of the 5 bars. Replenish your body in the state-of-the-art Awe Spa. Laze poolside sipping masterfully crafted cocktails. Do it all, or do nothing at all—stay in your room, watch a movie, enjoy top-shelf spirits, and order 24-hour room service. Luxury is all around you, and forever memories happen minute by minute at Le Blanc Spa Resort Los Cabos.FarePortal

name: Grand Velas Boutique Hotel
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17.3, Corredor Turístico, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in San José del Cabo, 100 metres from Boca del Tule Beach, Grand Velas Boutique Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the property also has a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at Grand Velas Boutique Hotel have a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. Cabo Real Golf Course is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while El Dorado Golf is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 25 km from Grand Velas Boutique Hotel.

name: Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Golf & Spa Resort
address: Previo Paraiso Escondido, Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This impressive spa hotel has its own private beach and is located on the Pacific side, 5 minutes’ drive from Cabo San Lucas. Boasting fantastic views of the Pacific Ocean, it offers an award-winning spa and avant-garde design. The adults-only Pueblo Bonito Pacífica Resort & Spa has 5 restaurants, including one serving Mediterranean food and a Japanese restaurant serving fresh sushi. There are also 5 bars, one of which features a fire pit. The resort offers Balinese beds on the beach which you can hire for a day. From December to April the hotel arranges whale watching trips. The air-conditioned rooms at the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica feature tiled floors and soft tones. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a kitchenette and a private terrace. Cabo San Lucas Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away, and the hotel offers a shuttle service on request. The pretty coastal town of San José del Cabo is 35 minutes’ drive from the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica.

name: Breathless Cabo San Lucas Adults Only
address: Paseo de la Marina 4570, Col. Médano, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Breathless Cabos San Lucas Resort & Spa, situated on Medano beach- the safest swimmable beach in Cabo San Lucas and within close proximity of the infamous Cabo San Lucas nightlife offers the perfect mix of luxury and lively entertainment. All 169 ultra-contemporary suites offer private and scenic terraces with spectacular ocean and marina views. Perfect for singles, couples or friends, Breathless Cabo San Lucas, the ultra-chic resort has a unique social vibe that inspires mixing, mingling and an all-around good time for all guests. Guests will relish in all the benefits of the Unlimited-Luxury(R) experience including unlimited premium spirits, daily refreshed mini bar, wait service at our two pristine pools and the beach, 24-hour room service, daily and nightly entertainment, 4 dining venues matched by carefully selected wines and a variety of premium spirits served at 4 bars and lounges, all without limit, required reservations or expected gratuities. Expect around-the-clock parties and entertainment at Breathless Cabo San Lucas with unmatched daily and nightly entertainment. Live big and party all day and night with a jam packed weekly schedule of parties and entertainment and monthly themed special events including after-hours dance parties, sensuality shows, pool parties, beach parties and more. Breathe deep at the relaxing spa by Pevonia(R) where you can unwind and rejuvenate for your next adventure. Treat yourself to a Breathless Cabo San Lucas experience where the party never ends and everything you need is at your fingertips.WebBeds

name: ME Cabo
address: Playa El Medano, 5, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: With its privileged location on the Medano Beach of Cabo San Lucas, ME Cabo features 5-star amenities in Los Cabos, one of Mexico’s fanciest destinations. Guest accommodations at ME Cabo are furnished with all the latest technologies. Private balconies along with rain showerhead and Aveda bath amenities are also provided. ME Cabo is a fashion and social hub for discerning local and international clientele, pulsating with a distinctive vibe that hints of celebrated hotspots. ME by Meliá blends design, art, music and service in a truly unconventional resort. And Aura hosts who welcome the opportunity to attend to your every wish and need. ME Cabo’s new hotspots include Confessions Skybar & Tapas, Taboo Beach Club, serving Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, Funky Geisha with beachside Asian fare and Mamazzita Mexican Soul with the best traditional cuisine. At only 10 minutes’ drive from downtown, ME Cabo hotel is just over half an hour away to the Airport.

name: Hotel El Ganzo Adults Only
address: Blvd Tiburon, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: All 70 guestrooms overlooking the Sea of Cortez are luxuriously appointed with modern, refined dcor with rustic undertones brought in with natural materials and woods throughout. A complimentary, fully stocked minibar, custom, artisan bath amenities, and wireless internet access are among the amenities.iHotelier/iStay

name: Marquis Los Cabos, Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM. 21.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of San Jose Del Cabo, Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Salon, executive floor, restaurant, bar, meeting facilities are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature executive lounge access, non smoking rooms, mini bar, inhouse movies, shower. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, hot tub, golf course (within 3 km), steamroom, spa. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that San Jose Del Cabo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury.Agoda

name: Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Puerto Los Cabos, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in the exclusive community of Puerto Los Cabos, Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Golf & Spa Resort offers adults a stunning Unlimited-Luxury® getaway in Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. The secure community around Secrets Puerto Los Cabos provides striking views of native flora and fauna and miles of unspoiled beachfront of the Sea of Cortez. The resort boasts 500 spacious non-smoking suites each with a private balcony or terrace, 24-hour room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, a Secrets Box for private in-suite dining and more. For added luxury, 150 ocean view suites are reserved for Preferred Club with access to additional privileges including a private lounge, upgraded amenities and mini-bar service, pillow menu, outdoor whirlpool and other extras. Unlimited-Luxury® continues throughout the resort where guests are treated to limitless gourmet fare and top-shelf spirits at elegant restaurants, bars and lounges. 24-hour dining options allow guests to enjoy late night bites at Coco Café. Or stay in and order room service. It's all available at any hour day or night. Indulge in the over 12,000 sq. ft. Secrets Spa by Pevonia and be treated to spa options in 21 treatment rooms, a full-service beauty salon or an extensive hydrotherapy circuit. Follow up this rejuvenation at the fully equipped fitness center or by taking part in one of many daily and nightly activities. Choose from a variety of beach, land and water activities, take a dip in one of two main heated pools, go on a leisurely walk along the 3 mile stretch of unspoiled Pacific Coast beach or catch the live nightly entertainment. Plus, the Puerto Los Cabos community provides, just steps away, a full service Marina with world-class sport fishing and artisan walkway, and the only composite 18-hole golf course in the area designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman.FarePortal

name: Casa Natalia Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Boulevard Mijares 4, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Come and enjoy the beauty, luxury and romance in one of the top 10 hotels in Mexico, as voted by Cond Nast Traveller readers. Casa Natalia is a charming boutique hotel which features 18 luxury suites decorated with unique local Mexican art, private outdoor terraces and hammocks.Located in the heart of San Jose del Cabo's Centro Historico, Casa Natalia is surrounded by quaint cobblestone streets, charming Spanish-inspired colonial buildings, family-owned jewelry shops, inviting restaurants and, of course, the natural beauty of Baja.Casa Natalia is home to the delicious internationally-inspired Mi Cocina Restaurant and Baja Oyster Bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Ocean View Master Suite At Rancho San Lucas
address: Carretera A Todos Santos Km 120, 23473 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Residence Las Flores
address: 545 Revolución de 1910, 23020 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Hotel Casa Rosada - Adults Only
address: Cuna De Allende 12 Col Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This exclusive hotel in San Miguel de Allende offers 16 unique rooms with unforgettable personalised service and a combination of Mexican, Indian and Moroccan art. Casa Rosada features spacious patios and balconies that overlook the city and the stunning church of St. Michael the Archangel. Guests can relax while using the hotel's free wireless internet or with an in-room massage. Xipal restaurant and bar at Casa Rosada offers a central outdoor patio and an indoor dining room. The restaurant serves regional and Mexican food for breakfast and lunch.

name: Hotel Casa Oratorio 'Adults Only'
address: Jardín de Zaragoza 18, 27700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located 3 minutes’ walk from the art crafts market in central San Miguel de Allende, Casa Oratorio offers free WiFi access. The rooms boast a balcony overlooking the colonial town. Each room here will provide you with cable TV and a hot tub. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with bathrobes and free toiletries. They are decorated with a typical colonial style mixed with Mexican details. At Casa Oratorio you will find on-site shops. The property is 5 minutes’ walk from the Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, 450 metres from Church of St. Michael the Archangel and 15 minutes’ drive from Sanctuary of Atotonilco. Guanajuato can be reached in a 1 hour and 30-minute drive.

name: Hotel Nena Centro
address: San Francisco 32 A, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located only 2 minutes’ drive from Juarez Park in central San Miguel de Allende, Nena Hotel Boutique has terraces with city views and an outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available. The suites feature hand painted sinks and are decorated with local artwork. All suites offer air conditioning and heating, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A coffee maker and coffee cups are also available. The on-site restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and a continental breakfast. Other food options can be found within 500 metres, in central San Miguel. San Miguel Parish Church is less than 300 metres from Nena Hotel. Queretaro is 40 minutes’ drive away and Guanajuato can be reached in 1 hour by car.

name: Artesana Luxury Villa
address: Privada Artesana, Colonia Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Artesana Luxury Villa boasts free WiFi throughout the property. The 3 rooms individually available include a flat-screen TV. Enjoy a cup of coffee from your balcony or from one of the shared lounges in the residence. All rooms include a private bathroom fitted with Bvlgari amenities and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bike hire is available. Artesana Luxury Villa is located on the side of a 5 star hotel and guests have access to all pool amenities, including pool, hot tub, gym and SPA centre. Church of St. Michael the Archangel is 500 metres from Artesana Luxury Villa, while Sanctuary of Atotonilco is 12 km from the property. The property is 500 metres from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 66 km from Artesana Luxury Villa.

name: Hacienda Las Amantes
address: Salida Real a Queretaro, #3, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Set in San Miguel de Allende and with Church of St. Michael the Archangel reachable within 500 metres, Hacienda Las Amantes offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. The property is around 13 km from Sanctuary of Atotonilco, 700 metres from Las Monjas Temple and 1.3 km from Allende´s Institute. The accommodation provides room service, and organising tours for guests. All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. Guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an à la carte or an American breakfast. Hacienda Las Amantes offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub and terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Public library and Chorro´s trip. The nearest airport is Querétaro International, 71 km from Hacienda Las Amantes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hacienda San Angel
address: Miramar 336, El Centro, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Hacienda San Angel is located in Puerto Vallarta. Free WiFi access is available. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport is 9.2 km from the property. A cable TV with a DVD player, air conditioning and a minibar are included in all rooms at Hacienda San Angel. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Puerto Vallarta Hacienda San Angel a garden a terrace and a bar are available. Other facilities offered at the property include a games room, an ironing service and laundry facilities. The hotel is 5.1 km from Cruise Ship Pier. Malecon Boardwalk is 10 minutes’ walk from Hacienda San Angel.

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Casa Kimberly
address: Calle Zaragoza 445, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set over the azure Banderas Bay, under the lush Sierra Madre Mountains, and surrounded by a sea of undulating terracotta rooftops, Casa Kimberly offers guests an exquisite escape. Nine intimate and luxurious suites, a spa, pool and fine dining restaurant evoke the spirit of enduring romance and inspired glamour.iHotelier/iStay

name: Casa Velas Hotel Boutique & Ocean Club-Adults Only
address: Pelicanos 311 Fracc. Marina Vallarta, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Casa Velas – Adults only is ideally situated on the Marina Vallarta Golf Club in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, and features luxurious accommodations as well as first-class amenities and services. Casa Velas – Adults only is surrounded by a peaceful tropical environment. Guests at the hotel can relax in the large swimming pool, or enjoy a tropical drink on the beach or at the swim-up bar. The hotel also boasts a state-of-the-art fitness center as well as relaxing spa services at the on-site wellness center. A short distance from the Casa Velas – Adults only is the El Malecon, a beachfront boardwalk featuring restaurants, bars and shopping centers. The hotel also provides free shuttle service to and from Casa Velas Beach.

name: Secrets Bahia Mita Surf and Spa
address: Av Carretera Cruz De Huanacaxtle – Punta De Mita 5, 63762 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Secrets Bahia Mita Surf & SPA perfectly located in the exclusive area of Bahia de Banderas near Punta Mita, and Marina Cruz de Huanacaxtle on the golden sand beaches of the Banderas Bay, fuses elegant and original design by Sordo Madaleno with nature elements, just minutes from the famous Marina de Cruz de Huanacaxtle. This adults-only getaway offers Unlimited-Luxury® privileges, including limitless gourmet dining and top-shelf spirits, daily activities, live entertainment, and Unlimited Connectivity – offering free Wi-Fi and free calling to the U.S. and Canada. Guests even have the privilege to visit nearby participating resorts with the Sip, Savor & See Dining Experience. All 278 spacious suites offer remarkable tropical views, partial ocean views & ocean views, modern décor and refined luxury amenities including daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Relax at the world-class Secrets Spa by Pevonia® Additionally, all guests have free flow access to nine restaurants, seven bars, two snacks and one coffee shop, and facilities at nearby Dreams Bahia de Mita. Do it all or do nothing at all at this romantic exclusive hideaway. Secrets Bahia Mita – Romantic. Refined. Remarkable.FarePortal

name: Villa Lala Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Carretera Barra De Navidad Km. 16.8, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Boca de Tomatlán in Puerto Vallarta, Villa Lala Boutique Hotel Adults Only is surrounded by mountains and faces the waterfront. It has free WiFi access available. The suites are brightly decorated in red colours and are spacious. They are equipped with 450 thread-count Egyptian cotton linens, bathrobes, LCD flat-screen HD TVs and are air conditioned. Puerto Vallarta city centre can be reached in a 30-minute drive and there guests will be able to find and explore a variety of restaurants and bistros. The Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Zonaz Boutique Hotel
address: 574 Pino Suárez, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Situated in Puerto Vallarta and with Los Muertos Beach reachable within 300 metres, ZonaZ Boutique Hotel features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and an outdoor swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers a garden. Every room includes a balcony with views of the city. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. description: Maison Bistro & Hotel in Budapest provides adults-only accommodation with a restaurant, a bar, and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers high-quality concierge services. At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. At Maison Bistro & Hotel rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Rich buffet breakfast with a' la carte dishes is included in the price and is available every day at the accommodation. Maison Bistro & Hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Trinity Square, Fisherman's Bastion, and Matthias Church. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 19 km from Maison Bistro & Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casati Hotel - Adults Only
address: Paulay Ede utca 31, Budapest 1061
description: Housed in an 18th-century building, the adult-only Casati Budapest Hotel is a boutique hotel located in the historic Terézváros District of Budapest. The hotel won the Hungarian Hotel of the Year Award in the 3-star category in 2019. It features a landscaped courtyard and interiors decorated with original works of art. The rooms and suites at Casati Budapest Hotel are designed in 4 different themes: Classic, Cool, Natural and Heaven. Guests are greeted with a welcome drink and can choose the style of their room, which is subject to availability. Most of Budapest's main sights are situated within walking distance of the hotel - the Opera, the Saint Stephen's Basilica, the theatres of Pesti Broadway, the Andrássy street and the cafes and restaurants of the Liszt Ferenc Square. The city centre pedestrian areas and the business district can all be reached within a 5- to 10-minute walk.

name: Reed Luxury Hotel By Balaton
address: 20 Vécsey Károly u., Siófok 8600
description: No description found

name: Aura Hotel - Adults Only
address: Munkacsy M. U. 5., Balatonfüred 8230
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool, an experience pool, several saunas and a hot tub, Aura Hotel Adults Only is set in Balatonfüred. The hotel has a sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. All air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a minibar with free mineral water. Extras include bathrobes, free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The nearest beach is within 300 metres of Aura Hotel Adults Only, while the Tagora Promenade can be reached in 450 metres.

name: Lua Resort - Adults Only
address: Anna Sétány 5, Balatonfüred 8230
description: Facing the beachfront, LUA Resort - Adults only offers 5-star accommodation in Balatonfüred and has a shared lounge, terrace and restaurant. 2.7 km from Eszterhazy Beach and 6.8 km from Tihany Abbey, the property offers a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. LUA Resort - Adults only provides some rooms with lake views, and rooms come with a balcony. All units will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden. Annagora Aquapark is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Balatonfüred train station is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 87 km from LUA Resort - Adults only.

name: Erla Villa
address: Kovács János u. 25, Eger 3300
description: Situated in Eger, 700 metres from Eger Castle, Erla Villa features accommodation with free WiFi. The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and bath or shower. Some units feature a seating area and/or a terrace. A buffet breakfast is served each morning and guests can benefit from the half board service with à la carte dining in the property's own restaurant. Erla Villa offers a terrace and guests can enjoy the indoor pool and garden at the property. Egri Planetarium and Camera Obscura is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Eger Basilica is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Margaréta Garden & Spa
address: Vitkovics M. u.2., Eger 3300
description: Offering accommodation units with free WiFi, cable TV and private bathrooms with shower, Margréta Garden Panzió is 1.5 km from the Castle of Eger, while city centre is 1 km from the property. Public parking is available. Common lounge area is featured. Within 500 metres guests can reach a bakery and a grocery shop, whilst restaurants are 1 km away. The Turkish Bath is 1.5 km away, whilst Eger Train Station is 2 km from the Margréta Garden Panzió. Guests can go on a wine tasting tour in the Szépasszonyvölgy Valley, a wine growing region with wine cellars, 2.5 km away.

name: Bükkös Hotel & Spa
address: Bükkös part 16., Szentendre 2000
description: A stay at Bükkös Hotel & Spa places you in the heart of Szentendre, and within a 10-minute drive of Szentendre Skanzen Village Museum. Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Akis Namelis Medyje- Dinosaur Park
address: Puršyno g. 9, Klaipėda 92404
description: Situated in Klaipėda, 12 km from New Ferry Terminal for pedestrians and cars, AKIS namelis medyje- Dinosaur Park features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Around 11 km from Akropolis Shopping and Entertainment Centre, the property is also 9 km away from Homeland Farewell and offers free WiFi. Guests can make use of the children's playground or the terrace, or enjoy views of the river and garden. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast at the Radailių dvaro restaurant. Klaipėda Švyturys Arena is 11 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Palanga International Airport, 22 km from AKIS namelis medyje- Dinosaur Park.

name: Sofijos Rezidencija
address: Jaunimo g.6A, Birštonas 59206
description: Located in the in the centre of Birštonas amid the Nemunas Loops Regional Park, Sofijos Rezidencija offers uniquely themed rooms dedicated to noble families of the Grand Duchy of Lithuania. An exclusive spa area with a pool and a sauna are available at a surcharge. Featuring high-quality carpets and fabrics, each room at Sofijos Rezidencija has a modern private bathroom with a make-up mirror and a hairdryer, a multi-channel TV and DVD, a dressing table. Free wireless internet access is available. Upon previous notice it is possible to arrange any other request. Fine Lithuanian specialities and international cuisine are served in Sofijos' elegant restaurant, which is equipped with historic-style furniture. Famous for its mineral water springs, Birštonas offers numerous possibilities for active leisure like fishing, canoeing, as well as skiing on one of the longest slopes of Lithuania. You can park your car for free on site.

name: Ego Spa
address: Karalienės Barboros al. 2A, Birštonas 59202
description: Situated in Birštonas, 1.4 km from Birštonas Museum, Ego SPA features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The zone of swimming pools and saunas is located in the next building. At the property, each room includes a wardrobe. At Ego SPA rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A à la carte breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Ego SPA include Saint Anthony from Padova in Birštonas, Balys Sruoga monument in Birštonas and Sacral Art Museum in Birštonas. The nearest airport is Kaunas Airport, 51 km from the property.

name: Bossa Nova Ipanema
address: Rua Bulhões de Carvalho, 337, Rio de Janeiro 22081-000
description: Located 300 metres from the famous Ipanema Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Bossa Nova Ipanema features free WiFi access. Guests can also enjoy a spa centre for an extra charge and the on-site restaurant. Each sophisticated room at this 4 stars boutique hotel is air conditioned and boasts an ultramodern décor. Guests will find a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a Nespresso coffee machine. All rooms feature a private bathroom with hairdryer. Guests will also benefit digital newspaper. Guests can enjoy a selection of contemporary Brazilian cuisine at the hotel’s restaurant. Bossa Nova Ipanema has a unique style created by the famous Brazilian fashion stylist Gloria Coelho. Copacabana Beach is 300 metres from Bossa Nova Ipanema, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon is 1,5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from Bossa Nova Ipanema. Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

name: Vila Santa Teresa
address: R. Almirante Alexandrino 2305, Rio de Janeiro 22745-271
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool and views of the sea, Vila Santa Teresa Hotel & Spa is situated in the Santa Teresa district in Rio de Janeiro. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the pool, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. Some units include views of the garden or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is included and there is a 24-hour front desk at the property. You can play tennis at the hotel. Christ the Redeemer is 2.5 km from Vila Santa Teresa Hotel & Spa, while Corcovado is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 4 km from Vila Santa Teresa Hotel & Spa.Read less

name: Senado Rio Hotel
address: Rua Do Senado, 189, Centro, Rio de Janeiro 20231-003
description: Hotel Fênix (Adult Only) features air-conditioned suites with room service, which serves pasta, sandwiches and continental meals. Centrally located in Rio de Janeiro’s Lapa neighbourhood, it offers free WiFi and parking. Some suite features include a sauna, hot tub, minibar, private bathroom, USB stereo and an 32" LCD TV with access to cable channels. Guests can enjoy a variety of meals in the dining area. Hotel Senado Rio is 600 metres from the Sambódromo parade street, and 1.8 km from the US Consulate. Santos Dumont Airport is 3.4 km away.Read less

name: Janeiro Hotel
address: Avenida Delfim Moreira, 696, Rio de Janeiro 22441-000
description: Soaking up the breeze, right bang smack on the sand, arms flung wide open to the Atlantic, this is JANEIRO. Located in the middle of Leblon's marvellous beach-culture, we bring Rio's bossa vibe to life. Nature is a joyful accomplice. And what about that view? The Cagarras islands scatter across a horizon blue as far as the eye can see. No make-believe needed here. At night, the Moon beams, and in the distance, the lights of Vidigal glitter and dance like fireflies. Pure poetry for the eyes, woven into the urban effervescence of the city. The barefoot simplicity of the beach finds its way into the smallest of details; from the rooms to the food, the music to the art, all is an extension of the golden sands out front. We sway to no other rhythm but Rio's.iHotelier/iStay

name: Te Adoro Hotel (Adult Only)
address: Rua Teodoro da Silva, 742, Rio de Janeiro 20560-001
description: Te Adoro Hotel (Adult Only) is located in Rio de Janeiro and offers rooms with free WiFi. This property is 2.5 km from Maracanã Stadium and 3.4 km from Saens Pena Metro Station. The property offers free parking. Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a minibar. There is also a dining table. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include pay-per-view and cable channels. At Te Adoro Hotel (Adult Only) you will find a 24-hour front desk. Breakfast is included and served in the room. The love hotel is 10,7 km from Santos Dumont Airport, 6,9 km from RIo de Janeiro city centre and 14,3km from Sugar Loaf Mountain. Copacabana Beach is 15 km away.

address: Rua São Vicente de Paula, 635 - Agronômica, Florianopolis 88025-330

name: Zank by Toque Hotel
address: Rua Almirante Barroso, 161, Salvador
description: Boasting a small swimming pool with sea views, this boutique hotel offers carefully designed ambiances and personal attention in the heart of Salvador. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms at this minimalist hotel are fitted with exclusive décor, that varies from classic retro to modern. Every charming room is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Zank by Toque Hotel serves a daily breakfast. At the on-site Do Toque Restaurant, guests can taste different dishes in a romantic ambience. Other facilities at the property include a 24-hour front desk and a sauna. Arena Fonte Nova is 3.6 km from Zank by Toque Hotel, while Barra's Lighthouse is 4.1 km away. Luis Eduardo Magalhães Airport is 20 km from the property.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, all units at the love hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a terrace. At Motel Del Rey each room includes bed linen and towels. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide guidance at the reception. Popular points of interest near Motel Del Rey include Armação Beach, Jardim de Alah Beach and Boca do Rio Beach. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 16 km from the love hotel.

São Paulo-Congonhas Airport is 15 km from the property.

At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At LAS HOTEL BOUTIQUE the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or a vegetarian breakfast. Iguazu Falls is 28 km from the hotel, while Iguaçu National Park is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 1 km from LAS HOTEL BOUTIQUE.
